string.original: Select the friends you would like to request this part from:
Do you have more pending requests to answer?
Please remember to answer each request right away.
You just sent {user,name} {part,object,indefinite,singular} - and you got one too!
string.variation: You just sent {user,fem} {part,indefinite,singular} - and you got one too!
You just sent {user,masc} {part,indefinite,singular} - and you got one too!

string.original: Not so fast, Commander. The Intelligence Report isn't available for this battle yet. Please, select an active battle.
Apologies, Commander. There is a prerequisite mission to complete first before we can advance to this battle. Please, select an active battle.
Commander, we cannot risk proceeding until we complete the '{task}' task!
Commander, we cannot risk proceeding until we complete these tasks: {tasks}!
Commander, reports indicate that our forces are already engaged in another battle. You must first complete the battle-in-progress. Resume the battle?
Commander, you've already mastered this island. You can strike again, but you will earn lesser rewards.
You destroyed the enemy Tank and have secured the home island... for now.
All right! You really put the crunch on the Captain!
You left Captain Krunsch crying in his cereal!
Enjoy this one, you clownfish. The Captain's just gettin' warmed up!
Nice shooting, Commander! You sank his battleship!
Good news on Cape Pleasant! Cows are back to work on their dairy farms.
That the best you got? I seen more fight from a flounder!
Way to go, Commander! His navy belongs in a bathtub.
That win was so full of awesome I can't wait for the encore!
Pipe down, you jellyfish! Couple lousy victories don't make you an Admiral.
Fish for dinner on Cape Pleasant! They're back in charge of their beaches!
With shooting like that the Captain's going to need more lifeboats!
You think I'm all washed up? Think again, you miserable carp!
Krunsch's battleship has been spotted approaching.
I don't care if my army's down the drain. You're still a spineless squid in my book!
A temporary setback. Just wait and see what I have prepared for you next!
She's going to be bowing to us after a few more victories like that.
Way to go, Commander! Kai Tana's troops are running scared now.
You have passed my test so far, Commander. You shall be a worthy servant.
Excellent! We liberated one of the weapon depots!
I could say Kai Tana fought valiantly... but that would be a lie.
We've secured another island and broken Kai Tana's blade!
I will fillet your defenses next time, Commander!
That's the spirit! You carved up Kai Tana's troops like a lobster roll.
I'm starting to get angry. You won't like me when I'm angry.
Nice shooting! Kai Tana's comrades are pushing up water lilies.
Next time I will make teriyaki of your rotten army!
Bravo, Commander! That victory should be hanging in the Louvre.
Yes! Kai Tana's wardrobe is in tatters and another island is ours.
Obviously, chivalry is dead - get ready to join it, Commander!
Go back to your little island where it is safe and warm.
Kai Tana's troops went Kai Boom!
Nice work, Commander! Kai Tana's planes are Kai-put!
That defeat was shameful. How will I ever tell The Raven?
Careful, Commander! You've got a tiger by the tail this time.
So you're the new Commander I heard about. I am NOT impressed!
You think you can just waltz in here and take me down that easily? Well you can't.
You did it! Jada's troops were expertly disarmed.
Good work! Reef Haven has recovered enough oil to power their generators!
Don't get cocky! I'm just about to get serious!
Beware, Commander: you're really playing with fire now.
They don't call me "Bombs" for nothin'. Stand still and I'll explain!
Jada keeps talking trash, but she's all bark and no bomb.
Bravo, Commander! You totally defused Jada's bombers.
Sorry Commander, I'm not leaving yet. I've got more pillaging to do!
Blast! You made me break a nail. That's gonna cost you!
Good news! Reef Haven is back in business and mounting a resistance.
Way to go, Commander! Jada's troops are starting to fizzle.
That battle meant nothing to me! Less than nothing! I spit on it! Ptah!
Now Jada Bombs is under attack from two sides - us and Reef Haven!
Way to go, Commander! Jada's planes are dropping like flies!
I have to admit, I didn't think a scrawny pest like you could hold up this long.
Keep it up, Commander! Jada's plans are about to go up in smoke!
I'm not going to keep warning you, Commander. Back off!
When The Raven gets wind of this I'm gonna have a hot mess on my hands. I'm outa here!
Lucky shot! Now I shall become my alter-ego, Baron Crush-a-lot!
Avenge the people of Teramar - show this airhead no mercy!
Nice shooting! The Baron's planes will have to make unscheduled layovers!
You think you're winning... but... well, maybe you are. But you won't!
Nice moves, Commander - you're flying circles around the Baron!
Sticks and stones may break my bones... Good thing you've only got bullets and bombs!
I soar like an eagle, but I feel like a sitting duck!
We own the sky, Commander! This whack-job is merely borrowing it.
I am going to crash your victory party and eat all your hors d'oeuvres!
Good news! People on Teramar are escaping the work camps.
Ha! Even in defeat I am still a Baron and you are not!
If he really is a Baron, that victory is a royal flush!
More wins like that and the people of Teramar will be home for dinner!
Rescue Teramar? Over my dead body... No, wait! Over your dead body!
Sweet shooting! The Baron's forces look like Swiss cheese!
A meaningless victory! My repairs shall cost only a few groats. We still use groats, don't we?
You smacked the Baron so bad, his kids will be born dizzy.
You did it! The people of Teramar have reclaimed their ore mines.
Curses! Not only did I lose, but my pilot's license has expired!
Bravo, Commander! The Baron's air force is in a tailspin!
Teramar will be free soon - thanks to your new tanks!
You will never liquidate Teramar! Oh wait... you said "liberate." My bad.
Congratulations! The Baron's frequent-flyer miles will soon be worthless!
Thanks to you I've now crashed 117 times! And those are just the ones I remember...
Turn it up a notch, Commander! It's time to ground this flyboy for good!
A good pilot goes down with his plane, especially when the "eject" button's broken.
Brilliant, Commander - you've clipped the Baron's wings!
Excellent work, Commander! The Baron is in a freefall!
So you shot me down. I'm an expert crasher - wait, where's my paaaraaachuuuuute!?!
Winning ain't everything. But it sure beats losing!
Nice job, Commander! You really put those girls in time out.
They clear-cut Isla Azul's forests, so I say we cut their allowance.
Oh! My! God! That was so unfair!
Let's settle this like ladies: Us against Scarlett...cage match!
That should teach those twins a lesson! Two aren't always better than one!
Excellent! You helped some islanders escape from the Isla Azul camps!
Watching you go down in flames would be, like, soooo hot!
We'll have to bring out the big guns to beat the Graves Girls again!
Bravo, Commander. That should teach those girls some manners!
Losing to you sucks, like, worse than Charm School!
You're proud of that victory? Really? You're so lame!
Nice victory, Commander! Double the pleasure, double the fun!
I'll bet the only thing those girls hate more than losing is wearing plaid.
Wow! You're, like, serious about this, aren't you?
Hurray! The last prisoners on Isla Azul have escaped from the Dark Alliance camps!
Nothing says we hate you like a missile through your heart!
Beware, Commander: Those girls have made a voodoo doll of you!
We're so awesome! Aren't we, like, your favorite enemies ever?
Good news! You've destroyed another Dark Alliance prison camp!
Two Graves masterplans for the price of one! It's a double plot - get it?
Time to step it up, Commander! The girls' troops are vulnerable.
Well played! Always nice to see bad girls get what they deserve.
Hurry up and die! We have matching black outfits picked out for your funeral!
You're gonna so regret this for, like... totally forever!
One victory does not make you an opponent worthy of my genius.
Beware: the only thing bigger than Von Helman's army is his ego.
This is impossible! I am smarter than you and your entire army combined!
Bravo, Commander! That was quite the smack down!
That's it, Commander! You're pulling Lobster Bay out of the boiling water!
You really taught the Professor a lesson with that one, Commander!
In the dictionary under "domination" there is a dashing picture of yours truly.
Well done! You're making the Professor look like a first grader!
Good news! We cut off the Dark Alliance's supply lines.
You think you won, but you are merely walking into my ingenious trap!
The Professor thinks he's smart but you just made him look stupid!
Nice shooting! You really put some lead in Von Helman's Zeppelin!
Surrender now! Your odds of another victory like that are miniscule.
Keep this up and we'll deep six Von Helman's depot in no time!
The Professor's going to have to study a lot harder to defeat you!
Do you have any idea what my I.Q. is? I truly doubt you can even count that high!
I only lost because your tiresome battle strategy put me to sleep.
Good news! We've broken through Von Helman's depot defenses.
Way to go! I'd give that victory over the Professor an A+!
Of course you won. I was only using only one-half of my brainpower!
Ha! You fell for the oldest trick in the book: "Playing Possum."
What a victory, Commander! School is definitely out for the Professor.
Enjoy it while it lasts, Commander. Victory is temporary; genius is forever!
You will need a tutor to comprehend the masterful assault I have planned next.
Let's step it up! The Professor's forces can't even spell "victory" anymore!
Good work, Commander! The Professor's tenure is about to end!
Time for me to show you how I earned my PhD in Destruction!
Great news! The Professor's supply depot is about to fall!
It seems I must alter my equation for complete annihilation...
Keep going! We've almost got this so-called genius in checkmate.
Savor that victory like a last meal, Commander. There will not be another.
Well played! You've destroyed the Professor's supply depot.
It does not take a genius to know The Raven will be furious with my defeat.
Hurray! Let's sing a dirge for the Professor's dirigible!
I'm actually glad you won. It will make your inevitable defeat by The Raven all the more humiliating.
Big whoop. You beat a one-armed blind man.
Good work, Commander! That was lights out for that "Mole Man."
Nice shooting! Mollman's forces suffered debilitating damage!
If I had a bazooka on my other arm you never would've won that one!
I must hand it to you, Commander, you really stuck it to Mollman that time!
Way to go! You bored a gaping hole in Mollman's defenses.
Next time I'm gonna drill you where the sun don't shine!
Well played! Mollman needs a more penetrating plan to beat you.
Good news! We secured an underground base on Pacificor with that win!
I guess you could say I'm really digging a hole for myself now...
So much for the "Mole Man!" His forces are reeling - it's the blind leading the blind!
Excellent! You really put the screws on Mollman that time.
Hmm... looks like my famous "Killer Driller" move is a bit rusty.
Great news! The Dark Alliance headquarters is now under attack!
Fantastic! Dirk Mollman's forces are leaking like a sieve!
I just realized "The bigger they are, the harder they fall" is painfully true.
Bravo! We broke through the Dark Alliance defenses on Pacificor.
Keep going! Digger is about ready to crawl back into his hole.
Try that again! I'll beat you with one corkscrew tied behind my back!
Well done! You found the chink in Digger's armor-plated arm!
That really hurt! I may look like a freak, but I'm a freak with feelings.
It will take awhile for Dirk's forces to dig themselves out of that one!
Hurray! The Dark Alliance headquarters on Pacificor is destroyed!
What can I say? After that defeat I'm totally screwed...
If I go back to The Raven I'm just digging my own grave...
That was your best shot? Prepare yourself for my injection of agony!
Nice shooting! Nurse Malady's the sickness and you're the cure!
The lights will be back on in Port Sylvan in no time thanks to you!
I will giggle over your grave, Commander. Laughter's the best medicine!
Malady is nursing her wounds after that victory, Commander!
Way to go, Commander! That defeat's a bitter pill for Malady to swallow.
Next time you'll see why I failed my "bedside manner" test!
Bravo! Our Panzers just turned Malady from a nurse into a patient!
The first rule of medicine is "Do no harm" - time to break the rules!
All your naval victories over Malady are turning her into a wet nurse!
Now it's my turn, Commander. An assault a day keeps the doctor away!
That's giving Nurse Malady a taste of her own bad medicine!
Good work, Commander! Malady's forces are the walking wounded.
Drop your Panzers and prepare for an attack from the rear!
There's no way Malady's insurance covers her injuries from that battle!
Malady will have to stitch together her forces after that victory!
Your blunt approach has worked so far, but just wait for my surgical strikes!
You made Nurse Malady look like a Candy Striper out there!
There's only one way to heal my bruised ego: annihilating yours!
Your patience has turned Nurse Malady's troops into patients!
Well played! Malady's forces are in critical condition now.
I may be on life support, but I'm about to pull the plug on you!
Congratulations, Commander! The power is back on in Port Sylvan.
I think Nurse Malady is going to fail her check-up, Commander!
Just the thought of informing The Raven of my defeat is making me ill...
The only remedy for defeat is a serious dose of vengeance.
Nice shooting! Let's send LeChomp's forces back to The Bayou!
Bravo, Commander! LeChomp is a curse on Tranquility Cove!
This may look easy, but LeChomp's still got a big bite.
Way to go, Commander! You really shut up Beau LeChomp!
He's too thick skinned to give up!
Keep going! Tranquility Cove is chomping at the bit to get rid of Beau.
Nice one! Keep this up and Beau will be crying to his mommy to save him.
Excellent! You really swamped LeChomp's forces that time!
Good work! That victory was a real mouthful for LeChomp!
Beau will be slithering back to his bayou shack soon enough.
That defeat should give LeChomp something to chew on...
You're making LeChomp look more like "LeChump" out there!
After that defeat, I'll bet LeChomp is calling Animal Control!
Beau will be retiring back into his stinky swamp with a few more like that!
Even if LeChomp cried "Surrender!" I doubt we'd understand him.
Beau is as thick headed as his little pet here!
Good news! Tranquility Cove is biting back against LeChomp!
Beau really bit the dust on that one!
That's it! You knocked the teeth right out of LeChomp's forces!
Surely Beau is tasting the pain with that big mouth of his!
Great news! Some of the mines have been liberated!
Perhaps Beau and his little pet will make a good addition to our zoo after we defeat him!
Tranquility Cove is almost free of this wretch! One more to go, Commander!
We did it! Tranquility Cove is free from LeChomp's clutches!
You call that a victory? I call it an unexplainable phenomenon.
Beware, Commander: The Eel isn't just slippery, he's also sneaky and slimy.
Next time I'll be two steps ahead of you... and one step behind too.
Good work! The Eel's stealth forces have been totally exposed!
Try that again! Fighting me is like fighting water - an exercise in futility.
Keep going! You've inspired the people of Avaron to revolt!
I know every move you are going to make before you even think it!
When we meet again you won't know what hit you... until you hear my laughter!
Way to go, Commander! You've got The Eel biting his own tail.
Nice shooting! I hope The Eel taught his aerial forces how to swim!
I am like the present you shake but cannot guess the contents.
Excellent! We cut off supplies to The Raven's new fortress!
The secret to beating me again is an unsolvable mystery!
The only mysterious thing about The Eel is why he's so cocky!
Great work! You've got The Eel's forces swimming upstream!
You stole that victory from me. Next battle I will steal it back... with interest.
Good news! You've freed some Avaronians from forced labor!
Next battle I will be like smoke: I will get in your eyes and make you cry.
Don't let up! We're reeling in The Eel's defenses!
I predict your next victory will resemble me - highly elusive!
Bravo, Commander! You're making The Eel squeal!
Great shooting! Looks like The Eel is crawling back into his hole!
You didn't beat me. You beat a doppelganger you didn't even know existed.
Hurray! The people of Avaron are free and Raven's fortress is unfinished.
That last victory was nothing more than a figment of your imagination.
It appears you finally won. But appearances can be deceiving... like me!
You think one loss bothers me? I drink Agent Orange Juice for breakfast!
Way to go! Let's hope the Sergeant gets demoted to Private!
Good news, Commander! You inspired Blister Reef to fight back!
Look out kid, I've got a long memory and a short fuse!
Remember: you can't spell Dan O'Might without D.O.A.!
Looks like the Sergeant's going to have to enlist some new recruits!
Another defeat? No sweat - The Sarge is still large and in charge!
That victory is sure to make the Sergeant blow his top!
Keep it up, Commander! Blister Reef's taken back some of their mines!
Next time I'm gonna make you cry "Aunt... and Uncle!"
Bravo! Thanks to you the Sergeant's demo squad was a dud.
You think you're so clever. My smart bombs are gonna make you look dumb!
Nice shooting! The Sergeant's defenses have been disarmed.
No more Mr. Nice Guy. The Pain Train is pulling into the station!
Next battle you won't even see me coming - I'm a stealth bomber!
Excellent! We captured a Dark Alliance shipment of Blister Reef's ore!
Anything that doesn't kill me just makes me use stronger explosives!
Way to defuse the Sergeant, Commander!
Another cheap win like that and I'm gonna blow your brains out!
Great news! Another couple victories and Sarge is ready to detonate!
Try that again and the last thing you'll hear is me yelling, "Fire in your pie hole!"
We reclaimed Blister Reef's ore and shut down work on Raven's fortress!
Congratulations! That victory deserves the Medal of Honor!
When Raven gets wind of this, watch out! The man's got an explosive temper.
Curse you, kid! That sound you hear isn't thunder - it's my future imploding!
The lucky fool wins but once; the awesome warlord, many times.
I think that victory made Kung Fucius sea sick, Commander!
Kung Fucius say, "He who beats a superior opponent lives on borrowed time."
Beware: Kung Fucius is never more dangerous than when cornered.
Good news! You've inspired Ithmar to take back some power lines!
My defeat? Improbable. Your demise? Inevitable.
That victory was satisfying but I bet you're hungry for another!
It's not the journey - it's the decimation! Way to go, Commander!
To commemorate this defeat, I wrote you a haiku: "Never. Again."
Hurray! We've regained control of part of the power grid!
Kung Fucius say, "There is dignity in defeat, but only when it is your enemy's."
Keep sinking Kung's ships and Davy Jones' locker will be full!
Allow me to offer some free words of wisdom: "Prepare to fail."
Kung Fucius say, "It is hard to spout proverbs when your mouth is full of crow."
Nice work, Commander! You've got the enemy forces totally kung-fused!
Success! The Valkyrie's power is back up to 50%!
Try that again and you will be seeing throwing stars!
Victory! You're turning the lights out on Kung Fucius!
Excellent! You've turned Kung's many black belts... to black and blue!
A good warrior learns from his mistakes. A good warlord avenges them.
That's the spirit! Kung Fucius will soon be helpless and powerless!
Kung Fucius say, "He who relishes victory will eventually choke on defeat."
The bee stings but once; the wasp, many times. To be clear: I am the wasp.
I think you've enlightened Kung Fucius on how dim his forces are!
Don't let up! You're on the brink of winning this power struggle!
Kung Fucius say, "One cannot have harmony without harm."
Step it up, Commander! Dr. Seabolt is counting on you to restore full power!
Experience teaches us humility; defeat, wisdom; revenge, ecstasy.
Kung Fucius say, "Glory is not in never falling, but in killing those who knock us down."
Sweet shooting! Ithmar will be trading candles for electricity in no time!
Fortune is fickle and fleeting - victory visits the violent!
You're making your opponent kung-furious with all these victories!
Keep it up and you'll make Kung Fucius walk the plank on his own ship!
Kung Fucius say, "The Raven will be a vulture when he learns of my demise."
Kung Fucius say, "The journey is the reward... unless it ends in soul-crushing defeat."
Shame on you, darling! Zat is no vay to treat a lady.
Wow! That victory was a real thing of beauty... unlike The Duchess.
All's Fair in Love and War
Bravo, Commander! The Duchess will need a facial after that defeat!
I'm not accustomed to losing. It's very bad feeling... like hair on ze man's back.
I am a duchess! Shooting royalty is zomething of a crime in my country!
Thanks to you, Commander, the Duchess is having a bad hair day!
Good news! We've received a tip that the Duchess is ready to fold!
Ve must do this again soon, darling. But next time... I vill be on top!
I'm sorry but The Duchess puts the "ass" in assassin!
Excellent work, Commander! That's what I call sharp-shooting!
I like a man who is polite enough to let a lady vin sometimes...
My Poppa always zay, "Vere zere is a vill, zere is a kill."
Great shooting, Commander! That victory was a real bulls-eye!
Don't stop now! San Topaz is ready to rally behind you!
After zat defeat, I vill take off ze silencer so you can hear my kill-shot!
Keep it up! Pretty soon The Duchess's hair is going to be all grey!
Ven I see you smile at your victory, my trigger finger itches so badly!
Great news, Commander! San Topaz is following your lead!
How vill I kill you next time? Let me count ze vays....
Look at that! The Duchess's forces are really misfiring now!
I think The Duchess is almost ready to throw in her monogrammed towel!
I was saving it for special occasion, but now you deserve my silver bullet!
Victory! You put San Topaz back in charge of their military!
Only thing vorse zan losing... is telling ze Raven I lose.
Listen to me, Darling. I vill make you an offer now you can't refuse...
One win is only one more than zero - that victory was worth very little!
Don't let up! This snake could crush those Corte Marino hostages!
Viper has two words for your puny victory: HAHA! Or is that one word...?
What a victory! You really took Viper to the house that time!
Next time I will crush you like a bug under my very expensive boot!
Nice shooting, Commander! You defanged some of Viper's forces!
Good work! Viper should use his trust fund to buy a clue.
Nothing can stop Viper in our next battle! I am bigger than the Big Bang!
Take away this guy's steroids and he's as scary as a super model!
Soon I will learn to spell "victory" and you will learn to love defeat!
If this guy's as dumb as he looks he probably can't spell "surrender" either.
You can't conquer me! I am unvincible!
Keep at it, Commander! Viper is starting to unravel!
Viper sheds losses like a snake sheds its skin... but I do not eat my losses.
Well done! That's how you beat Viper - bite him in the asp!
You fight like a baby, Commander! Time to put you in a Viper Diaper!
You can't beat me again! The only me-beater... is me!
Forget speaking with a forked tongue - this snake can barely speak!
No more toying with my prey! Now Viper will swallow you whole!
Super! A few more victories like that and Viper will be hisssstory!
I refuse to lose! Except when I lose. Then refusing is pointless.
After that defeat Viper should just tattoo "loser" on his forehead!
Bold move, you snake. Oh, wait... I am the Viper!
Nice job, Commander! That victory over Viper was cold-blooded!
This is unpossible! I thought the size of my muscles guaranteed victory!?
Look at that, Commander! Some of Viper's forces are slithering away!
Next time you are in striking distance Viper will bite your tank!
Congratulations! You've freed some hostages from Viper's coils!
How do you keep winning?! There must be a secret button I'm not pushing...
Viper should change his name to "Vapor" because he just went up in smoke!
Brilliant! All the hostages are safely back on Corte Marino!
The Raven lied to me! He said I couldn't lose! Or was it "shouldn't"...?
Some say losing builds character. Viper says losing builds losers!
Consider that victory a gift. But do not expect another.
Nice shooting, Commander! Now there's egg all over Raven's face!
Way to go, Commander! You really cracked some heads on Skull Island!
Who says I am cruel? Next battle I will put you out of your misery quickly.
Success! That humbling of Raven is quite a feather in your cap!
Good work! The Raven's forces just got totally plucked!
This is Skull Island! Your monotonous battle plan is making it "Dull Island."
Nice job, Commander! You're making light work of the Dark Alliance!
Next time your tombstone will read: "Here lies the embodiment of failure."
Keep it up, Commander, and Raven will be migrating to prison for winter!
When I think of what I have planned for our next battle, I actually pity you.
Keep at it! We've released some prisoners from Skull Island!
That's the spirit, Commander! Put an end to this birdbrain!
To say you are a waste of my bullets is a colossal understatement...
Well done! The Raven may be my father, but you are his daddy!
Bravo! Soon the Raven will have to wave goodbye to his Sun Storm!
I have nothing but contempt for you. And that is more than you deserve.
Fool! You think my hope has flown? Nevermore!
Excellent work! That's the way to make the Raven eat crow!
I don't know how you do it, Commander - that was poetry in commotion!
You think you actually deserved that victory?! You should just forfeit next time.
Don't let up, Commander! You're turning Raven's forces into chickens!
After that victory, everybody's going to be ravin' about your skills!
From now on the magnitude of my battle prowess will be off the Richter scale!
Hurray! You really brought the Raven back down to Earth!
You play checkers, Commander, while I play chess. Prepare for checkmate!
Great work! The Raven's forces are falling from the sky!
You have two choices: surrender or die. Although I would prefer both!
Brilliant! You freed the last of Raven's prisoners!
Defeating me is a fool's errand, but even you are not so foolish to try!
Do you hear that? That's the sound of enemy forces fleeing in fear!
A few more victories and Raven goes into a maximum security birdcage!
There will be no Cinderella story this time - I will crush your glass slipper!
In the pantheon of great battle commanders, you are at the top!
Be warned: I am planning a huge victory celebration in your honor!
When I was commander of your island I won with infinitely more style!
You think you've won your freedom, but your new empire will be a target for more warlords. Good luck with that...
Wow, Champ. Great technique. You could use better gear, though. We should talk.
I like your style, Chief. Vicious, but subtle. They should name a burrito after you.
I gotta hand it to you, there, Kimosabe. You aren't bad.
Sergeant Cross taught me everything he knew, which wasn't much. Lucky for you.
Yeah, I did my training with Cross. That's why I went into business for myself.
So, friend, we can do this all day. I get my planes and boats wholesale.
You angry, Chief? You fight like you're angry. This isn't personal, just business.
You'd do better if you used the latest in military technology. Take my card.
Okay. You've made your point. You're tough. But there's more going on here than meets the eye.
Look, Chief. I know you want to help the citizens here, but I can't have you busting up my army.
What do you want from me? A discount? Fine. Stop attacking, and I'll get you a good deal.
You're a lot better at this than Sergeant Cross.
You call that a battle? My kid sister hits harder than that.
I can't help but think how great you could be with a good arms dealer at your side.
You win. I said it. Okay? Now let's get these villagers off this island before they melt.
Get off my dang island! I'll whoop you 'til your backend glows red!
No one messes with a LeChomp. I'ma fixin' to make you pay!
Golly, I think I done learned my lesson. I'm awful sorry. NOT!
You uppity fork-user! You think you can tell me how to run my island? You was wrong!
I ain't a-feared of ya. Us LeChomps got ONE THING: heart, and keen intellectualistic powers.
Maybe y'all would be swayed by my feminine charms? Purty please stop attackin' me.
I reckon you want a heap o' trouble. Well, now, you done got it.
No one told you that it ain't right to flank a lady?
You got NO IDEA how hard it is to command an army while wearing such tight shorts!
I know I look sweet as a rhubarb biscuit, but I will pop your head off like a dandelion.
That's it. Enough of this. I'm sickin' my pet possum on you. Remy, ATTACK!
Y'all asked for it. Ever had a possum assassin after you? Now you do.
Sleep with one eye open. Remy's gonna take you out. Last laugh is mine! HA!
What're you on about? Leave my island alone. My possum is on the way. Pain's a-comin'!
Okay, you took this island. I hope you choke on it. I didn't like it no-how.
I think you and me, we'd be friends. But you attacked me, so now I hate you.
I'm namin' a new dish after you. It's "Stupid-head Gumbo" - try it.
Ever seen a possum play dead? Mine's gonna show you how...the HARD WAY. By killing you.
We gonna talk, or we gonna fight?
That's it. You win. So much for the power of my short-shorts. Do with me what you will.
Eh? I guess you aren't a hallucination. Or is it "an" hallucination? WHO SAID THAT?
It's been so long since I've seen anyone, I'm just grateful for the company.
I know my island like the back of my hand, and...where did that mole come from?
I told you, use poison the gas! No, I didn't! Yes, I did!! You keep out of this! Fine!!!
You win THIS round, but I'm still not convinced you're not a figment of my imagination.
Have you met my best friend, Spaulding? He's also my military advisor. Great job, Spaulding.
Spaulding claims that we should have used an echelon formation. He's a jerk.
I keep calling the Dark Alliance for reinforcements. Too bad the radio battery died four years ago.
Oh, sure, the Dark Alliance left this island years ago. Yeah, RIGHT.
My orders are to defend this island until told otherwise. And that's what we'll do!
Funny, I haven't heard anything from command in a while. Must be radio silence.
Spaulding says that losing a battle is okay. He's very supportive.
You know I'm holding back, right? I enjoy the conversation, so I'm not destroying you.
The Ultimate Weapon is almost ready. Only a few more fights, then WHAM!
This Is My Weapon, This Is My Pineapple
I can barely contain myself! They think they're winning, but they'll soon fall into our trap!
We shall be victorious! Wait. Where's the ultimate weapon? IT'S GONE!? Uh-oh.
Toes Can Talk If You Listen
What? Have we been talking out loud again? SPAULDING! Thanks for nothing.
So...they really did leave me behind? I hope someone has been feeding my goldfish all these years...
A'amakualenalena not happy. Now, people suffer.
A'amakualenalena gives one more warning. Leave now.
Okay, THIS is last warning. Go away, or bad thing happen.
The people of these islands fear ME, not YOU. Go away!
You can not win. A'amakualenalena has loyal followers. They will stop you.
A'amakualenalena starting to get angry. You not like A'amakualenalena when he get angry.
Why you attack A'amakualenalena? You hate independent island-states or something?
A'amakualenalena wears mask on outside. You wear mask on inside. Think about it.
Mrs. A'amakualenalena going to be upset that we lose so many planes, boats, and tanks.
You want to know why A'amakualenalena will destroy these islands? Too bad!
A'amakualenalena only eats canned meat. That makes anyone grumpy.
No more Mr. Nice A'amakualenalena! Leave island, or ELSE.
There is no way to defeat A'amakualenalena! A'amakualenalena is all-powerful!
You win, A'amakualenalena lose. But no more. Cross this line, and you die!
A'amakualenalena think you need to learn to respect sovereignity of other nation-states.
You meet that guy who talk to pineapple? And the girl with pet possum? Weird, huh?
Just because A'amakualenalena wear a mask and grass skirt doesn't mean he have poi for brains.
You think you have beaten A'amakualenalena? A'amakualenalena is rubber, you are glue...
The battle is over...but not the war! A'amakualenalena will return, according to plan!
This island will be available soon!
The fight for the Molten Reef continues in a few weeks.

string.original: It looks like the enemy has deployed Experimental Units! Let's fight back with some of our own!
Incoming enemy forces! Boost your troop's strength with the most powerful units.
You are about to face the strongest enemy we have ever confronted! Purchase units here to strengthen your army!
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it repairs all of our units, +25 health.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it repairs all of our units, +50 health.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it repairs all of our units, +100 health.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it increases the damage done by an attack.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it attacks one unit, with bonus against Army units.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it attacks one unit, with bonus against Navy units.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it reduces damage taken by our units.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it reduces one enemy unit's accuracy.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it increases all units' chance to hit the enemy.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it decreases the chance any unit will be hit by the enemy.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it prevents a targeted unit from attacking.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it unleashes poison gas, damaging all enemy units over time.
I suggest we use: {consumable} - it destroys ALL enemy units!
Healing does not take a turn during combat! Heal {healAmount} Strength now.
Commander. Distressing news. The Molten Reef Islands, a cluster of eight independent island nation-states, has been devestated by volcanic activity. We have to help.
It's not a simple matter, though. The leaders of these islands are rejecting our help. You're going to have to defeat them, to save the people.
Lieutenant B.F. Dealio. Arms dealer. Rogue. Sergeant Cross, you and Dealio go way back. Why would he put people in harm's way?
Dealio only looked out for himself. That dang fool wouldn't kiss his momma if there weren't money to be made by doin' it.
B.F. Dealio, I presume. Why are you fighting us?
Let me guess...Scarlett, right? I didn't know the top dog was so... beautiful.
Save it, Romeo. We need to evacuate the people from your island.
Yeah, look... it's complicated. The people don't trust you.
They don't trust US? That's interesting. Do they know how you came to be the leader of their island?
On this island, I'm not really a leader, more of an...advocate. We're staying. Unless you want to try to make us leave?
You filthy maggot. Remember me? How can you betray your uniform?
I'm not wearing a uniform, Sarge. It's not my style.
You'd risk people's lives, just to make a buck?
Didn't you learn anything in boot camp?
You risk people's lives every day, for a lot less than a buck, Sarge.
Tell you what, you resign your commission, and I'll let you start the evac. No? I didn't think so. All talk. No guts. Silly hat, too.
With all due respect, beautiful... I don't take orders any more. But maybe we can work something out.
Okay. I needed to know that you guys were for real and could handle the task at hand. I talked it over with Scarlett, and I'll help you get these people to safety. Trust me.
Bella-Jeane LeChomp is a sparkplug, isn't she? We went out once or twice, and I like 'em a little bit nutty, but... she gives bat-guano-crazy a bad name.
Hey darlin'...remember me? B.F. Dealio? How's that, uh, adorable possum of yours?
I thought you'd never call again, sugar! I'm just happy as punch to hear your voice!
Right, sure. Say, would you mind if we helped some of the people on your island get out of the path of the molten lava?
For you, dumplin'? I'd snatch that big ol' moon from the sky and wrap it up in a ribbon for ya!
That's what you told me. You remember. You'd wrap the moon up for me, in a ribbon.
Right, right. I remember. Yeah. I'm still trying to find a piece of ribbon long enough, dollface.
Because, I know you'd never lie to me, B.F. You wouldn't, right? You said you thought I was "keen."
Keen. That sounds like something I'd say, I guess.
So when we gonna tie the knot, then?
Uh...um.... You know what? That's the first thing we should talk about once we get those people off your island.
My pet possum Remy will be the ring bearer. He's "keen" to do it. You know? You git my drift? Maybe Tiki-guy can come too.
Sorry to interrupt your train of thought, but... who is this Tiki guy?
Who are YOU, supposed to be? Nice eye, by the way.
I'm Scarlett, military advisor for the...
Frankly, "Scarlett"...I don't give a dang possum's behind. Just you stay away from my man!
I didn't get to be no commander of no stinkin' island by listenin' to no reason!
Let us help those people, and then we can go out for dinner. Someplace nice.
I hate you, B.F. Dealio! And I hate everyone on this island! You want me, come an' git me!
That went better than I expected.
Yeah, right! Nice try, Spaulding. Where'd you get the wig? Where am I? Oh, there I am.
Look, I'm trying to pass by your island, but I see you've got a lot of defenses and I don't want you to open fire on us. Humanitarian mission.
The Dark Alliance left me in charge of the Automated... the Robotic... something.
Let us pass, buddy. Maybe we can bring you along? You could use a warm meal and a shower. Or two.
Yeah, RIGHT! I'm not falling for any tricks. "Defend the island, at all costs!"
You're a Dark Alliance soldier? Man, the Dark Alliance left these islands years ago.
Ha! Ha-ha! Good one! Like they'd just FORGET about ME? And my robotic army? Right! HAHAHAHA! Ha.
Okay. I guess we'll have to do it the hard way.
We've been scanning the island. It looks like you're the only person there. It's just rocks and lava.
Just me and Spaulding. So what? We control the largest mechanized force in the world! Now get outta here!
Can't do that, brother. We need to move our transport vehicles to save some people, and your defenses could chop us to pieces.
Oh. Sure. Fine. Go ahead. We won't shoot. Promise.
Who made these weapons systems for you, Sparky? That's some nice tech you've got.
Top Secret. But, you know...Spaulding and I have had years to tweak the designs.
Interested in selling any of those designs to me? I could make it worth your while. Maybe buy you another pineapple?
Well, we're going to have to take you out. It's nothing personal. And whatever happens, I'm pretty sure you'll be better off than you are now.
Blah blah blah blahblahblah. So much blabbering. I miss the quiet. Let's get this over with!
The man in the wooden tiki mask does. He's a nice man.
Tiki mask? Hm. I wonder if it's the same guy. Why does he want to help you?
He just wants to make sure I complete my mission. No one takes this island.
So, your information is that this "Tiki guy" has been encouraging the island leaders to resist our help?
It looks that way, gorgeous. I've seen him around my island, too.
Why would he want the people of his island to suffer?
No idea. I'm more concerned about blasting through his defenses now, and G'ing the F.O.
There's a lot we don't know about his military strength.
All the more reason to strike first and strike hard. We learn any more, and we may chicken out.
Silence, woman! You speak only when the great A'amakualenalena speaks to you.
We need to help the villagers. We'll do it the easy way or the hard way. Your choice.
We've blasted through half of your forces. We don't want to fight. We're here to help.
Good. Plenty more where that come from. Now, leave! A'amakualenalena handle volcano. You, bad.
Once it's safe, we'll bring them back. This isn't an invasion. We're saving lives.
You attack A'amakualenalena. Now you die. A'AMAKUALENALENA HAS SPOKEN!
Last chance, tubby. Let us through, or we destroy your military.
A'amakualenalena very sensitive about weight. It glandular condition.
You need to stand down. Now.
Commander, looks like that dang Tiki-guy escaped. He fell back to another island.
We should pursue, but...something is jamming our radar. It'd be suicide to puruse him without knowing what's out there.
It could be a trap. Scarlett's right.
Hey. I got the wreckage of A'amakualenalena's chopper. I'll be making these within a week. See, it all worked out.
Shut up, you worthless weasel! We're here to help people, and you tryin' to get rich!? You disgust me.
Get rich QUICK. And I'm well on my way, Sarge, no thanks to you.
How about I knock out some teeth for ya, so you can replace 'em with diamonds?
What kind of name is Dealio, anyway?
Sicilian. It was originally DeAlio, if you must know. What kind of name is Cross?
I'm sure your mom had plenty of names to choose from, with all those male friends she used to have over...
Boys, boys. Settle down. Lt. Dealio helped us, and we appreciate that. But...we need to re-group and figure out what to do next. This isn't over.

These Lumber Mill contracts provide wood which is required to build structures.
These Oil Well contracts provide oil which is required to build military units.

The Barracks provides access to land-based military units such as Soldiers, Artillery and Tanks.
The Shipyard provides access to sea-based military units such as Gunboats, Battleships and Carriers.
The Hangar provides access to air-based units such as Fighters, Airships and Bombers.
The Experimental Shipyard provides access to sea-based experimental units.
The Experimental Barracks provides access to land-based experimental units.
The Experimental Hanger provides access to air-based experimental units.

There are no Golden Villain Units available. Earn one Mastery Token on all of a Villain's islands for their Golden Villain Unit to appear in the Mastery Exchange. Earn all three Mastery Tokens for that Villain to unlock it for purchase!

We are 100% chin-deep in dog-jam trouble now, Commander. Empires are invading our island for no dang reason. Fight as many of them off as you can. For every enemy Commander we defeat, we get Prize Tokens. Use 'em or lose 'em.
Opponents are randomly selected by level from all players, whether or not you're Facebook Friends. You will share your first name, profile photo, and game statistics with foes. You can leave this mode at any time by clicking on this icon."

We are 100% chin-deep in dog-jam trouble now, Commander. Empires are invading our island for no dang reason. Fight as many of them off as you can. For every enemy Commander we defeat, we get Prize Tokens. Use 'em or lose 'em.

Opponents are randomly selected by level from all players, whether or not you're Facebook Friends. You will share your first name, profile photo, and game statistics with foes. You can leave this mode at any time by clicking on this icon.

Well well well. Look who grew a pair! Welcome to the party! Battle Blitz is where you fight with people other than your Neighbors. Earn Prize Tokens for rewards on the Battle Blitz Prize Machine. Yeah, you can invade others, but they can invade you too. They'll see your first name, profile photo, and XP. So what? Let's go get 'em.

Battle Blitz mode allows you to enter battle with people other than your Neighbors. You will earn Prize Tokens used to access exclusive rewards on the Battle Blitz Prize Machine. As you can invade opponents, they may also invade you and will view your first name, profile photo, and XP.
You are selecting to opt out of Battle Blitz. You can rejoin Battle Blitz by clicking the Battle Blitz icon to opt-in.

string.original: Challenge other players across the globe!
Unlock the newest and most powerful units!
You can build this in your {location}
Attack other players and gain Dominance! Your starting Rank is determined by your existing XP level.
Protect your Dominance! Assemble the strongest Defense Force possible. Don't worry, these units will not be destroyed by enemy attacks.
These are the units which you can build once you reach the required Dominance Rank.
Prepare for retaliation! Assemble your Defense Force immediately!
Your Defense Force will be used to fend off enemy attacks in World Domination.
Units in your Defense Force will not be permanently destroyed during enemy attacks.
Your force's strength limit can be increased by advancing in Dominance Ranks.
Congratulations on setting up your new Defense Force. Now get out there and dominate!
Current strength/maximum possible strength. Raise the maximum strength by advancing your Dominance Rank.
The total number of battles your Defense Force has won and lost while defending against incoming enemy invasions.
Your Attack Force is too weak! Maximize your force's strength or you could lose Dominance!
Your Defense Force is too weak! Maximize your force's strength or you could lose Dominance!
Hit list! Tell your friends to attack this rival.
Total number of victories for your Defense Force and Attack Force
Total number of losses for your Defense Force and Attack Force
Total number of victories from attacking an opponent
Total number of times opponents have lost against your Defense Force
Percentage of players with more Dominance than you
The current Defense Force strength/maximum possible strength
Send a Private Taunt to Your New Rival!

Messages sent from here can only be seen by your opponent. View new messages from your rivals in World Domination Taunt History on the main screen. You can ignore any taunts; it's just a way to remind people who's dominating!
Time remaining until Revenge Bonus expires
Gain bonus Dominance rewards by defeating this Rival before the timer expires
Every day, staff the Z Refinery, and collect random amounts of Element Z! You may collect Element Z every 24 hours.

Scan this area to reveal the unit

This building will be repaired in {days} days

You will not receive Liberty Bonds from opponents who are 11 or more levels below you.
The Bounty Center will be ready again in {time}
For the next hour you will earn a Liberty Bond for every battle you win in Battle Blitz, World Domination or against a neighbor.
Activate the Fluxatron to automatically complete Military production contracts and collect 3x the payout on repelled invasions!

You need the following parts to complete this building for a 15% Military bonus and 10% Air Force contract acceleration

The Fluxatron will be ready again in:
Use the '+' and '-' buttons to specify the amount of Empire Points to send to each friend
{user} purchased an Empire Points gift card for you! What a great Ally! Use the form below to send a Thank You card to express your appreciation!
Type a Thank You message here
Thank you for the Empire Points!
{user} wants to express their Thank You for the Empire Points gift card.
Collect all the parts necessary to finish the first part of your Super Ore Mine, and you'll be able to begin producing {type}!
Each Ore Multiplier increases the amount of ore that you can produce in the same amount of time.
Ask your friends for parts required to complete an Ore Boost. Each Ore Boost will allow you to produce more ore in the same amount of time.
Build for Coins in the Super Ore Mine
Collect these parts to complete your Prison Camp and start capturing prisoners.

Invade your neighbors to imprison them and earn Capture Points! Maintain enough Capture Points to activate an XP boost for your Empire. Prisoners may escape by repelling your invasion, or will remain captured for up to three days before breaking free.
Capture prisoners of higher levels to earn extra Capture Points (CP)!
Collect these parts to complete your Prison Camp. Once completed, you can capture and imprison your neighbors to activate a double XP boost for your empire!
Your Prison Camp is activated! Collect 1.5 times the XP per action during this time.
Your Prison Camp is activated! Collect twice the XP per action during this time.
Your neighbors are playing dirty! You've been imprisoned in these Prison Camps.
To free yourself, repel their invasion from your Empire. Go ahead and take some prisoners of your own too!
These prisoners have escaped from your Prison Camp! Invade them now to re-capture them.
As the president of Allied Monitory Fund, I travel between empires offering lucrative business to those who have shown an impeccable fiscal record.
Marvelous! So this is how it works...
You make a small investment of {amount1} Empire Points. In 3 days I will return with {amount2} Empire Points.
I'll wait until you collect the money from me. Afterwards I will leave for another three days.
This will continue for {number} days. So you could get up to {total} Empire Points!
Once you collect the Empire Points from me, they must be used in no less than 24 hours.
...Else the funds will be spent on roast chicken for our shareholders as per AMF regulation.
Collect your money every three days to maximize profit. An astute officer such as you should be able to triple your money!
Your money is on its way! Please come back in {time} to collect your Empire Points.
{username} here are your {amount} Empire Points. Remember, as per AMF guidelines you have only 24 hours to spend it! You can continue to collect every 3 days for {day} days.
How about using the Empire Points to finish your {building}?
How about using the Empire Points to finish your quest?
How about using the Empire Points to expand your military might?
Spend money before time runs out.
Way to go, your quest is complete! The Energy Cradle has been activated and your Energy cap has increased to 60.
Be sure to replenish the Energy Cradle. For every 12 hours that you don't, the bonus 10 on your Energy cap will decrease by 25%. However, it will never drop below 50.
Come back in {time} to replenish the Energy Cradle and enjoy increased Energy! You can reach a maximum cap of 60 Energy.
Be sure to replenish the Energy Cradle. For every 12 hours that you don't, the bonus 10 on your Energy cap will decrease by 25%. However, it will never drop below 50.
Supply {amount1} Oil and {amount2} {rare} to reactivate the Energy Cradle.
Be sure to replenish the Energy Cradle. For every 12 hours that you don't, the bonus 10 on your Energy cap will decrease by 25%. However, it will never drop below 50.
Collect these parts to complete your Energy Cradle. Once completed, you can activate it to increase the cap on your maximum Energy to 60!
Way to go! Now keep replenishing the Energy Cradle and watch your Energy cap increase!
Your maximum Energy has decreased because you haven't replenished your Energy Cradle regularly. Go back and do it now!
Keep supplying your Energy Cradle with resources at regular intervals to avoid a reduction in your maximum Energy cap.
You can now increase your maximum Energy cap to 60 by completing the Energy Cradle. Build it now!
Redeem your Merit Tokens here! They'll be valid for a limited period only so make sure to use them all before this offer ends.
Ask Friends for more Merit Tokens
Collect these parts to complete your Element Z Collider. Once completed, you can produce Element Z just like any other resource.
Choose a contract to start producing Element Z
Your {x} Element Z reserve is full! Use it in battle and then come back for more.
You need the following parts to complete this building for a 12% acceleration on military production.
You need the following parts to complete this building for a 12% military bonus and twice the payout on repelled invasions across your Empire.
You need the following parts to complete this building for a 20% industrial and housing bonus.
These friends will be able to help you finish your buildings faster by giving your parts, fill crew positions and repel invasions from your empire.
Note: Neighbors added here will not be added to your friends on Facebook.
Commander, it's time to make your choice - are you ready to opt in?
Upgrade parliament to add allies without adding them on Facebook.
You need to be friends on Facebook first.
To post on {player}'s wall, you will have to add them as a friend on Facebook first.
The honorable thing to do would be to congratulate your opponent, but you can't do that unless you add them as a friend on Facebook first.
You helped {neighbor} and earned 1 Energy. Add them as a friend on Facebook and tell them about it.

string.original: Add Houses to your Neighborhood to save on housing space in your Empire.
Expand your Neighborhood to get extra Coin payouts.
Note: You can harvest the Houses whenever they're ready with just one click.
You need the following parts to expand your Neighborhood
You have all the parts to expand your Neighborhood
Do you want to harvest the Houses in your Neighborhood for {total} Energy?
You need the following parts to complete this building for a 15% industrial bonus and a 15% acceleration on military production.
You've received {part} through Dominance War Chest! Finish your {building} now!
Evil forces attacked under the cover of darkness. Rebuild before they strike again.
Evil forces launched a sneak attack against our peaceful island. Get ready to fight back!
The homeland is attacked by a mysterious enemy, but {user_name} swiftly fends them off. What is the meaning behind these attacks?
Restore your empire to its former glory!

{empire_name} is founded and the people are rallying behind their new commander. It is soon discovered that the attacks are being orchestrated by a syndicate of cruel warlords called The Dark Alliance which is being led by a mysterious man named The Raven.
Fight The Dark Alliance on their own turf!
{empire_name} builds its first Navy to defeat the warlord, Captain Krunsch. After this victory, it becomes clear that this Dark Alliance leader was sent to steal {rare} from the region.
Keep our secrets out of enemy hands!

{empire_name} builds its first Air Force and liberates Mercadia's military bases from the cunning Kai Tana. Her defeat reveals a possible grand scheme requiring The Raven's warlords to scour the region for all the {rare} they can find.

The arrogant Jada Bombs is caught plundering Reef Haven's oil reserves before {user_name} puts a stop to it. In her hurried retreat, she leaves behind the schematic of a mysterious machine called the "Sun Storm". It's clear now that this is what The Raven must be building. But what is it?
Protect our island's most precious asset!

{user_name} liberates the people of Teramar from their enslaver, Baron Crashalot. He leaves behind information revealing the true purpose of the Sun Storm device: it is a weapon of mass disintegration! The Raven intends to eliminate all those who are not loyal to him.
Beat the Raven to the Big Bang!

{empire_name}'s leading scientist, Dr. Seabolt is captured by The Graves Girls, who have forced him to work on the Sun Storm. Once {user_name} frees Dr. Seabolt from his captors, he pledges to develop a counter weapon to neutralize this weapon of doom.
Shut him down before he blows you up!

Dr. Seabolt reveals that Professor Von Helman is building the Sun Storm at a facility on Lobster Bay. {user_name} defeats Von Helman's forces, thus slowing down The Raven's progress. But The Raven won't abandon his diabolical plan that easily.
Lead the revolt against the Raven's tyranny!

The victory at Lobster Bay reveals that Scarlett led the revolt against the previous tyrannical regime. Meanwhile, Dirk "Digger" Mollman has converted Pacificor's City Hall into a Dark Alliance outpost. After a grueling struggle, Dirk is expelled from Pacificor by the forces of {empire_name}, and he is sent into exile.
Push the Raven back to his island fortress!

As Dr. Seabolt tirelessly researches a counter to the Sun Storm weapon, the Dark Alliance warlord, Nurse Malady, is kidnapping civilians and sending them to a toxic testing facility. {user_name} stops this treacherous plot by defeating her forces and sends her into hiding. The Raven's influence in the region begins to decline.
Steal the Plans to the Raven's fortress!

Dr. Seabolt finishes his design for the counter weapon to The Raven's Sun Storm weapon, calling it "The Valkyrie". Constructing it however, will require the high density ores of Tranquility Cove, which is being guarded by Beau Le Chomp. {user_name} defeats this gator-loving warlord and frees up the metals for the Dr Seabolt's Valkyrie project.
Dig up the Raven's dark secrets!

The Raven's slimy general, The Eel, is forcing the people of Avaron into collecting resources for the Dark Alliance. {user_name} frees the people of Avaron and soundly defeats The Eel on the battlefield. When the dust settles, The Eel reveals the shocking truth that The Raven is the former leader whom Scarlett ousted.
Help Scarlett battle the ghosts of the past!

The Raven has received word about the Valkyrie project and intends to prevent its construction. He sends Sgt. Dan O Might to attack the prototype, but {user_name} stops him in his tracks. In the wake of his retreat, he leaves a controversial photograph revealing that The Raven is Scarlett's father.
Stop the Raven from taking revenge on Scarlett!

Scarlett confesses that The Raven is indeed her father, but that he must be taken down nonetheless. The Valkyrie prototype is ready for testing, but the Dark Alliance's Kung Fucius has hijacked all the power in the region. Final testing of the Valkyrie resumes once {user_name} defeats Kung Fucius and power is restored.
Learn the location of the Raven's island fortress!

The Valkyrie is almost complete. The only remaining question is the location of The Raven's secret fortress. After a humiliating defeat, The Raven's girlfriend, The Duchess, surrenders and reveals the crucial information needed to plan the final assault.
Turn the Raven's last ally against him!

The Raven's personal protege, The Viper, is the last warlord standing between {empire_name} and The Raven himself. But even the man whom the Raven thinks of as the son he never had can't hold up to the military genius of {user_name}.
Put an end to the Raven's reign of terror!

As a final gesture of defiance, The Raven activates his Sun Storm weapon upon {empire_name}. The Valkyrie, however, is also launched and proves to be more effective than imagined. It not only destroys the Sun Storm, but also The Raven's island fortress! The Raven's reign of terror has ended.

{user} defeated Captain Krunsch and is bent on defeating The Raven and his Dark Alliance.
{user} took down the cunning Dark Alliance temptress and revealed a clue about The Raven's plan!
Jada Bombs went down in flames thanks to {user}! Another clue about The Raven's plot has been exposed!
Baron Crashalot is now pushing daisies thanks to {user}! The Raven's evil plot has finally been exposed!
Baron Crashalot hit the ground hard!
{user} crushed the Dark Alliance warlords, the Grave Girls, and freed our Dr. Seabolt from their oppression!
{user} showed Von Helman who the real military strategist is and wiped out the last of his forces.
{user} has the Dark Alliance on the retreat as Dirk "Digger" is sent running for his life.
Dirk "Digger" Mollman has finally dug his own grave!
{user} saved the people of Port Sylvan by defeating their cruel oppressor, Nurse Malady!
Nurse Malady is put to bed!
{user} has safeguarded the precious ore of Tranquility Cove by throwing outtreacherous Beau Le Chomp and his forces.
{user} has freed the people of Avaron from their slavery under the torment of The Eel.
The Eel is captured and interrogated!
{user} has protected the empire's secret weapon prototype by taking out the cunning Dan O Might!
Sgt. Dan O Might is defused!
{user} has restored hope to the empire and soundly defeated Kung Fucius, the Dark Alliance's martial arts master.
Kung Fucius bows to his doom!
The Duchess has surrendered herself to {user,name} in exchange for vital information about The Raven!
string.variation: The Duchess has surrendered herself to {user,fem} in exchange for vital information about The Raven!
The Duchess has surrendered herself to {user,masc} in exchange for vital information about The Raven!

string.original: {user} has forced The Viper to leave The Dark Alliance in shame. Now all remaining is The Raven himself!

string.original: After a failed assassination attempt, Remy the possum was backed over by an ice cream truck.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
Remy the possum tried to kill {user} with a catapult, but it backfired.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
An arson attempt against {user} went horribly wrong when Remy the possum spilled gas on himself.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
While planting a bomb in {user}'s house, Remy the possum accidentally cut the blue wire.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
Instead of drowning {user} in the perfect hit, Remy the possum discovered he couldn't swim.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
{user} would never have seen the steamroller coming, but Remy the possum ran over himself first.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
A drone bomber would have taken out {user}, but Remy the possum didn't get the coordinates right.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
Don't taste the poison to make sure it hasn't gone bad, as Remy the possum learned... the hard way.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
It was a great plan to scare {user} to death with a nude photo of Grampy LeChomp, but Remy the possum saw it first.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!
It was supposed to look like {user} had a skydiving accident, but instead, Remy the possum has fallen and can't get up.
Oh my gosh, you killed Remy!

string.original: Naturally, our activists need barbers. Back in my day, political protesters didn't need squat to make their point.
Help, me out will ya? Send me a Barber and you get one too!
Our new nation celebrates their first Independence Day today.
We could use a little help. Send us a miniature flag and you get one too!
I've promised to protect our new neighboring nation and I intend to keep my promise.
Send me a Coast Guard Radio and you'll get one too.
Nothing like a military grade catapult to bring a persistent fortress crumbling down.
Will you send me one? You'll get one too.
{user,name} needs some of your best propaganda.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs some of your best propaganda.
{user,masc} needs some of your best propaganda.

string.original: I need to get the message across and quickly.
Some compelling propaganda should do the trick. Send me a poster and you'll get one too.
We've all been conditioned to fear the wooden ruler.
This'll teach those intruders a lesson. Send me one and you'll get one too.
We'd tell you why, but then we'd have to taser you.
Needs the force. You know any space geeks?
{user,name} needs a few extraterrestrial conspiracy theorists.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs a few extraterrestrial conspiracy theorists.

The kind you stick under a desk. We've got some suspicious activity that needs monitoring.
Send me the tiniest, nosiest little bugs you've got and you can keep one too.

So send me the best camouflaged parachutes you can get a hold of and keep one for yourself.
{user,name} needs a few sharp, pointy objects.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs a few sharp, pointy objects.

string.original: Modern Torture Devices, to be specific.
I've got a group of phoney terrorists who won't talk so I gotta do what I gotta do. Don't judge me!
{user,name} needs some Knock Out Gas Grenades.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs some Knock Out Gas Grenades.
{user,masc} needs some Knock Out Gas Grenades.

string.original: AKA - skunk in a box. It knocks you out for a good 24 hours at least.
If you've got some, pass it on and keep one for yourself.
Babel Phish is such a good listener. Send me one and you can keep one too.
I need to decode some Titan signals real quick.
Titans, holograms. The toys we get to play with.
{user,name} needs a few Holographic images of Titans.

I need a few 'I'm Awesome' badges.
Everyone is awesome, but I'm more awesome.

With this gift, you are well on your way to becoming THE dominant Empire. Come check out the newest Units, Power-Ups, and Missions!
Thank you for the Empire Points
{user} has sent you a Thank You note for the Empire Points gift card. Read it now!
