{user,name} needs a man after midnight. Make that all through the day.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs a man after midnight. Make that all through the day.
{user,masc} needs a man after midnight. Make that all through the day.

string.original: I'm going somewhere really, really unpleasant and I need team of armed, trained Body Guards to watch my back.
Make them good looking ones too, they're for a group of important people I'm about to have a very awkward conversation with.
{user,name} needs an introduction to important people!
string.variation: {user,fem} needs an introduction to important people!
{user,masc} needs an introduction to important people!

string.original: I the core member of the Global Alliance present for an important signing.
Not the old lady kind, I need Military Night Camouflage to make sure we don't get killed on the field.
Can you help me out? Send me a tub and you get one too.
The flimsier the better. I need to jump off a moving plane and survive.
Send me a Rope Ladder and you can keep one too.
{user,name} needs members of the GA Tribunal.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs members of the GA Tribunal.
{user,masc} needs members of the GA Tribunal.

string.original: I'm trying to put some terrible people behind bars for good.
Nothing like a good Global Alliance trial to set things right with the world.
Ask for a Spectral Range Goggle
Or I will, with a little help from some Spectral Range Goggles, of course. Send me a pair and you'll get one too!
Don't worry; it has nothing to do with omens or crazy symbolism. I'm just trying to woo some Alpini soldiers to my Empire. Black Feathers are the way to go!
All I want for Easter is a basket eggs. Mind you, only chocolate ones will do! Go on, do a good deed and send a Chocolate Egg my way. You'll get one as well!
Ask for a box of Loose Fill
Actually, not just anything. I need some Boxes of Loose Fill to make sure a Nuke and some other Power-Ups aren't bounced around too much. No one wants that.
{user,name} is in need of some liquid courage!
string.variation: {user,fem} is in need of some liquid courage!
{user,masc} is in need of some liquid courage!

string.original: I have a brutal military exercise to get through, all for a Russian battleship. Send me a Courage Enhancer, will you? You know the kind - clear, strong and liquid.
Quite literally, my burst of excitement is almost atomic! Send me a Plutonium-239 Fissile to take me that little bit higher.
{user,name} has their sights trained on you.
string.variation: {user,fem} has their sights trained on you.
{user,masc} has their sights trained on you.

string.original: I want ammunition for my brand new war toy. Shoot to win - send a Howitzer Shell and get one too.
Quick, I need Missile Launchers to arm my new aircraft carrier. Show some love. Send one and you'll get one too.
Scarlett wants me to catch a rogue wildcat, but I think it moved on. I still want the reward she promised, though. Send me a Lynx, will ya? You'll get one as well.
I need some Camouflage Jackets to get me ready for my foray into the jungles. Be a pal and send one... you'll get one too!
{user,name} is going that extra mile for Liberty!
string.variation: {user,fem} is going that extra mile for Liberty!
{user,masc} is going that extra mile for Liberty!

string.original: I'm collecting Liberty Banners to exchange for a windfall of Liberty Bonds. I can almost smell that expansion. Send one, and you'll get one too!
{user,name} will do almost anything for a grant!
string.variation: {user,fem} will do almost anything for a grant!
{user,masc} will do almost anything for a grant!

string.original: Almost. But I'd really rather not resort to drastic measures. Send me a Grant Approval, will ya? You'll get one too!
{user,name} is looking to score some Crocodile Scales.
string.variation: {user,fem} is looking to score some Crocodile Scales.
{user,masc} is looking to score some Crocodile Scales.

string.original: I can't quite explain why, but it has something to do with important, military tactics. Be a pal and send one\u2026 you'll get one too!
{user,name} is on the lookout for a Tricolori Patch!
string.variation: {user,fem} is on the lookout for a Tricolori Patch!
{user,masc} is on the lookout for a Tricolori Patch!

string.original: I'm hosting my version of the Frecce Tricolori aerobatics in my Empire. Send me a Tricolori Patch for my pilots and you'll get one too!
{user,name} would love a Snake Chew Toy.
string.variation: {user,fem} would love a Snake Chew Toy.
{user,masc} would love a Snake Chew Toy.

string.original: Not because I've suddenly developed a taste for them. I'm trying to lure in a mean old Mongoose. Go on, play nice. Send one, and you'll get one too!
{user,name} is reaping the benefits of Seabolt's obsession with Tesla.
string.variation: {user,fem} is reaping the benefits of Seabolt's obsession with Tesla.
{user,masc} is reaping the benefits of Seabolt's obsession with Tesla.

string.original: It takes more than just 50 Energy to satisfy this tiger! I'm building an Energy Cradle to increase my maximum Energy cap.
Help out! Send {item,object,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!
string.variation: Help out! Send {item,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!

string.original: I'm organizing a convention to discuss the treatment of Prisoners of War across Empires. It's important stuff. Send a Data Projector, and you'll get one too!
Shiver me timbers, {user,name} has a pirate problem and is conducting a submarine stakeout. Send them a Photonics Mast and you'll get one too!
string.variation: Shiver me timbers, {user,fem} has a pirate problem and is conducting a submarine stakeout. Send them a Photonics Mast and you'll get one too!
Shiver me timbers, {user,masc} has a pirate problem and is conducting a submarine stakeout. Send them a Photonics Mast and you'll get one too!

string.original: But first, Helmet Mounted Displays are what I need to keep my focus while pulling crazy mid-air maneuvers.
Extremist groups can be a pain to deal with but I have to try. Send me a Mediator with ninja diplomacy skills and you'll get one too!
I'm fighting an uphill battle with all units on the blink. Send an Engineer to fix the problems and you'll get one too.
I need Scuba Gear for a high-risk rescue mission. Send me a set and you'll get one too. But hurry, there are lives at stake!
I'm going to a conference and I need to do some showing off.
Send me some Holographic Notepads and you get one too.
{user,name} needs to put some life into this party.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs to put some life into this party.
{user,masc} needs to put some life into this party.

string.original: It isn't much fun when everyone's knocked out. Trust me.
Send me a Resuscitation Kit and you get one too.
I'm trekking in some of the harshest conditions in the world.
I can use a pair of the best Military Grade Snow Boots you can find. Send me one and you get one too.
No, not the metaphorical kind. It's dark in this cave and I need some light.
Send me an Industrial Torch and you get one too.
Ask for a Dual Band Radar
Dual Band Radar Images are just what i need to get my hands on a Zumwalt. It's going to be the next big thing in the Navy! Send one and you'll get one.
{user,name} is going a-reaping - for Element Z!
string.variation: {user,fem} is going a-reaping - for Element Z!
{user,masc} is going a-reaping - for Element Z!

string.original: ...But first, I need to build an Element Z Collider. Send {item,object,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!
string.variation: ...But first, I need to build an Element Z Collider. Send {item,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!

string.original: {user,name} is never going to be out of their Element Z again!
string.variation: {user,fem} is never going to be out of their Element Z again!
{user,masc} is never going to be out of their Element Z again!

string.original: I've built my Element Z Collider. Now, thanks to Seabolt's efforts, I can produce Element Z right here in my Empire!
You just sent {user,name} coins--and you also got some! Oh, lucky day!
string.variation: You just sent {user,fem} coins--and you also got some! Oh, lucky day!
You just sent {user,masc} coins--and you also got some! Oh, lucky day!

string.original: That's right, {user,name} wants to cash in on some sweet military benefits by building a Grand Citadel. Send {item,object,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!
string.variation: That's right, {user,fem} wants to cash in on some sweet military benefits by building a Grand Citadel. Send {item,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!
That's right, {user,masc} wants to cash in on some sweet military benefits by building a Grand Citadel. Send {item,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!

string.original: {user,name} is in the mood for love... some Russian love!
string.variation: {user,fem} is in the mood for love... some Russian love!
{user,masc} is in the mood for love... some Russian love!

string.original: I've just built myself a Grand Citadel. It's exotic, mysterious and all kinds of fancy adjectives. You should get one too!
{player} is the Grand Poobah of stylistic building!
A friend of mine is at the mercy of a psychotic woman, you know the kind right?
I need the best code expert you've got to help him out. Send one and you can keep one.
{user,name} needs to turn on the charm.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs to turn on the charm.
{user,masc} needs to turn on the charm.

string.original: I need to impress a certain lady to get some information out of her.
You've done it too so quit judging and hand over some roses. You get one too.
{user,name} has a couple of angry teenagers on their hands.
string.variation: {user,fem} has a couple of angry teenagers on their hands.
{user,masc} has a couple of angry teenagers on their hands.

string.original: I need a double-armored, twin-compartmented police van to take these hoodlums to prison, while I watch them stare out from their matching steel meshed windows.
Bureaucracy, keeping us under the speed limit since... forever.
{user,name} requires some very official pieces of paper.
string.variation: {user,fem} requires some very official pieces of paper.
{user,masc} requires some very official pieces of paper.

string.original: Foreign Airspace Permission documents are crucial to their mission, please do what you can to help.
And believe me, bombs are the messiest.
Send me the best Bomb Squad you've got and save me a whole lot of cleaning up.
{user,name} needs a few disposable cell phones.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs a few disposable cell phones.
{user,masc} needs a few disposable cell phones.

string.original: I'm tracking a couple of very dangerous teenage girls who, like any other teenage girl, can't resist a call on her cell phone.
Help me and you'll help us all.
Mirror, mirror, on the wall, who's the worthiest of them all?
{user,name} is collecting Merit Tokens to exchange for some cool prizes in the Merit Exchange. Be a good ally, send a Merit Token and you'll get one too!
string.variation: {user,fem} is collecting Merit Tokens to exchange for some cool prizes in the Merit Exchange. Be a good ally, send a Merit Token and you'll get one too!
{user,masc} is collecting Merit Tokens to exchange for some cool prizes in the Merit Exchange. Be a good ally, send a Merit Token and you'll get one too!

string.original: You just sent {user,name} a merit token - and you got one too!
string.variation: You just sent {user,fem} a merit token - and you got one too!
You just sent {user,masc} a merit token - and you got one too!

string.original: Send me {item,object,indefinite,singular} and I'll return the favor. It may or may not be for an Intelligence Bureau I may or may not be building.
string.variation: Send me {item,indefinite,singular} and I'll return the favor. It may or may not be for an Intelligence Bureau I may or may not be building.

string.original: I've just built myself an Intelligence Bureau to rival any Secret Service!
{user,name} is all set to gather intel!
string.variation: {user,fem} is all set to gather intel!
{user,masc} is all set to gather intel!

string.original: What better way to start that by building a Turkmen Assembly? Send {item,object,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!
string.variation: What better way to start that by building a Turkmen Assembly? Send {item,indefinite,singular}, and get one for yourself, too!

string.original: {user,name} is preparing for a cultural exchange.
string.variation: {user,fem} is preparing for a cultural exchange.
{user,masc} is preparing for a cultural exchange.

string.original: I'm promoting peaceful relations with the Turkmen Republic and I just finished building an assembly for them!
Send me {item,object,indefinite,singular} and I'll return the favor. It's all for La Station Militaire, which is my ticket to the repository of French military strategy.
string.variation: Send me {item,indefinite,singular} and I'll return the favor. It's all for La Station Militaire, which is my ticket to the repository of French military strategy.

string.original: With La Station Militaire in my Empire, I'm going to be pulling some sneaky French moves on the battlefield!
{user,name} is getting all up in France's military you-know-what!
string.variation: {user,fem} is getting all up in France's military you-know-what!
{user,masc} is getting all up in France's military you-know-what!

string.original: What can I say, it's thrilling!
Send me some Surveillance Cameras so I can take down some very dangerous criminals and you can keep one too.
Hold on, {user,name} needs to grab a pen!
string.variation: Hold on, {user,fem} needs to grab a pen!
Hold on, {user,masc} needs to grab a pen!

string.original: Yeah, I'm old school like that. Help me out will ya? Send me some pens and notepads and you get a set too.
But nothing to kill with. Send me some automatic pistols and you can keep one too.
Send me a cell phone and we can stay connected, whenever, wherever.
You get to keep one too.
{user,name} needs your latest Prison Haute Couture!
string.variation: {user,fem} needs your latest Prison Haute Couture!
{user,masc} needs your latest Prison Haute Couture!

string.original: I've got some high profile new inmates coming in today and I want them to stand out.
Give me your stripy finest and you can keep a pair too.
{user,name} needs to track a hacker, a slippery one.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs to track a hacker, a slippery one.
{user,masc} needs to track a hacker, a slippery one.

string.original: The Eel stole some very important data from me.
Send me some Hacker Tracker Worms so I can find him and make him pay. You can keep some too.
I've got no time for airport security today.
Send me some extra badges so I can get through them quickly and you can keep one too.
{user,name} needs to fall from the sky... and survive.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs to fall from the sky... and survive.
{user,masc} needs to fall from the sky... and survive.

string.original: Send me your best parachutes and you can keep one too.
I'm going on a long, tiring mission.
Some energy bars would really keep me from sleeping on the job. Can you help me out?
I'm going to be slumming it out in the desert.
Send me a canteen full of water, it could be the difference between life and death.
Heigh Ho! It's off to work we go.
{user,name} need to go digging for some ore in a foreign land.
string.variation: {user,fem} need to go digging for some ore in a foreign land.
{user,masc} need to go digging for some ore in a foreign land.

string.original: Send a pickaxe and keep one for yourself.
{user,name} is on the lookout for a message in a bottle.
string.variation: {user,fem} is on the lookout for a message in a bottle.
{user,masc} is on the lookout for a message in a bottle.

string.original: A large group of my men are missing at sea.
Send me your best Ocean Rescue workers and you can keep one too.
A very bright light across the ocean.
My men have mysteriously disappeared from the face of the ocean and I need to find them. Send me a search light please.
A pocket knife does me more good than the biggest gun in the world.
I'm in a sticky situation and some of your pocket knives would really be a life saver right now. Help?
Does this make me look fat?
I'm trying on wetsuits and I can't find the one I need.
Could you send me some of your best military grade protective body suits? I'd really appreciate it.
{user,name} wants to make love, not war.
string.variation: {user,fem} wants to make love, not war.
{user,masc} wants to make love, not war.

string.original: Send me some of your coolest Peacekeeper Uniforms and I guarantee the increased safety of your carriers.
Also, you can keep one too. Thanks!
I need the brightest Crime Scene Tape you've got to keep people away from the scene of the crime.
Send me some and you get some too!
It seems being a regular at my job doesn't change things.
I still have to flash some ID to get in. Send me the best ID Badge you've got and you keep one too.
{user,name} is getting a lesson in stealing.
string.variation: {user,fem} is getting a lesson in stealing.
{user,masc} is getting a lesson in stealing.

string.original: A group of tech-savvy art thieves stole my most prized possession.
Now I need a few classes in the Art of Stealing 101. Send me an Art Thievery Expert please!
Or rather, is about to be bugged.
Could you send me some of your best Two-Way Bugs to help me keep in touch with an agent undercover?
{user,name} needs a pretty face with a quick tongue.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs a pretty face with a quick tongue.
{user,masc} needs a pretty face with a quick tongue.

string.original: What did you think? Send me your best one and you can keep one too.
{user,name} needs to cheat, just this once.
string.variation: {user,fem} needs to cheat, just this once.
{user,masc} needs to cheat, just this once.

string.original: I'm cheating for a good cause.
Send me your best Art Forger and you can keep one too!
That's right! I need some donuts for a little police celebration I'm having on the capture of a dangerous group of thieves.
{user,name} is looking into a real estate fix.
string.variation: {user,fem} is looking into a real estate fix.
{user,masc} is looking into a real estate fix.

The Dark Alliance
Intel: A sinister man they call "The Raven" has recruited warlords from around the world to attack us. We don't know this mastermind's real name, where he is headquartered, or why he picked our island to invade.
We must rebuild and fight back before he strikes again!

A Huge Discovery
Intel: Dr. Seabolt has discovered an incredible new power source, which will allow us to build amazing new Experimental Units! Our first, the HOSPITAL SHIP, will be available soon!
This will change everything.
Intel: Reports show the warlord called "Captain Krunsch" has raided Cape Pleasants' farms to feed Dark Alliance forces, leaving the citizens without food.
Profile: An old school seaman who relishes taking out his enemies the old-fashioned way: with his bare, arthritic hands.
Caution: Fortified with Vitamin D and Fish Oil
Intel: Captain Krunsch had a note from the Raven under his hat. It read: "Steal their {rare}. It's essential to my plan."
Profile: A cunning temptress with a tongue as sharp as her blade, Kai Tana will cut you up and feed you to the fishes.
Intel: Hidden in Kai Tana's closet was a list of all the metals the Dark Alliance is stockpiling; the only metal they are missing is our {rare}. We think they're up to something.
Profile: Highly skilled in hand-to-hand combat, Jada's entire body is a lethal weapon. Especially when she wears skin-tight pants.
Danger: Do Not Fight While Using Hairdryer!
Intel: Hidden in one of Jada's wigs was the schematic for a mysterious machine called "The Sun Storm". Further analysis is required to understand its purpose.
Profile: As a child Crashalot tried to fly from his rooftop and knocked a few screws loose. But that only partially explains his psychotic behavior.
Caution: His Overhead Bins May Have Shifted During Flight
Intel: In Crashalot's plane was an instruction manual for The Sun Storm: a machine that creates a wave of energy capable of destroying entire islands.
Profile: According to their parents, these terrible twins are identical in every way, right down to the matching "black heart" birthmarks on their backsides.
Warning: May Use Teenage Sarcasm As A Weapon

Intel: The Girls bolted in opposite directions, blaming each other for their miserable defeat. Left behind in their powder room were the keys to the scientists' prison cells. The now freed scientists report that the Raven is on schedule to complete his "Sun Storm" device.
Profile: To compensate for his diminutive size and hideous appearance, Von Helman employs uncommon cruelty and sports fancy glasses.
Danger: Brain Under Pressure! May Explode!
Intel: Inside one of his nicely pressed uniforms, Von Helman had this old newspaper article regarding a previous war in the region...
Profile: As a kleptomaniac child, Dirk tried to steal a toy from a Doberman. He lost an arm but gained a career as a thief specializing in tunneling.
Intel: After his defeat Digger fled the region in fear. His last words were: "If I go back to The Raven I'm just digging my own grave."
Profile: Malady loves to "play doctor" with unsuspecting victims, dispensing generous doses of pain and suffering.

Intel: Inside Malady's medical bag was an assortment of very long needles and a prescription for The Raven's depression brought on by recent battle losses. The Dark Alliance is clearly on their heels.
Profile: This Bayou-born brawler loves his alligator like a son. But he absolutely refuses to do a paternity test.
Warning: Keep Hands And Feet Outside The Gator At All Times
Intel: LeChomp had only two items of value left behind in his swamp shack: his momma's Gumbo recipe and an oath to keep Scarlett from accessing the Metals of Tranquility Cove.
Profile: A real slippery character. His background is such a mystery that no one has ever seen his entire face, although some say he's just hiding bad teeth.
Intel: A troubling excerpt from The Eel's interrogation: "Do you believe in ghosts? You should. Because the former commander of your island is alive... and he is The Raven!"
Profile: While other boys were playing sports, young "Sarge" was playing with fire. And dynamite. And napalm. And nitroglycerin...
Danger! Extinguish Open Flames Before Fighting
Intel: Found in the Sarge's man-purse was a puzzling photo of a young Scarlett under the parental supervision of a commander.
Profile: A master of every martial art known to man, plus a few he invented himself, there is only one art at which Kung Fucius fails: Karaoke.
Caution: Kung's Eyebrows Are Licensed To Kill
Intel: With Kung Fucius eliminated, power has been restored to the region and progress on the Valkyrie Weapon has resumed.
Profile: Currently Raven's girlfriend, but her first love will always be the sniper rifle her father gave her for her 8th birthday.
Intel: The Duchess helped Raven form his empire. She offers to reveal the location of his secret fortress in exchange for sanctuary.
Profile: Puny and picked on as a child, Viper used steroids and a huge trust fund to transform himself into an egomaniac who could pick on the world.
Intel: Viper left this letter behind: "The Raven talked me into spending all of my own trust fund money to pay for this whole war. If you defeat him, can you get some of my money back?"
Profile: Feared by his allies, hated by his enemies, The Raven is an unapologetic tyrant who wanted his pet mascot to be an eagle, but he couldn't catch one.
Intel: Millions of dollars in Raven's offshore bank account were just withdrawn by Viper for the purpose of "building my own empire."
Profile: Lieutenant Dealio originally trained with Sergeant Cross. Eventually he resigned his commission to go into business for himself as a weapons salesman.
Intel: B.F. has agreed to work with us in order to help rescue the people of the Mokupuni Archipelago. How could that possibly go wrong?
Profile: The surly sister of Dark Alliance thug Beau LeChomp, Bella-Jeane's bi-polar nature was too much for her brother's organization and led her to find her own path.
Caution: She looks sweet, but she's lethal. Watch out for her killer pet possum, Remy.
Intel: LeChomp ranted on and on about a crazed Tiki-shaman. Is she off her medication?
Profile: Corporal Ezekiel J. Grunt was left on the island of Yanuyanu after a Dark Alliance occupation. However, no one bothered to tell him that the war was over (that one, at least)...
Caution: Grunt has been stranded for years, in charge of an automated military program.
Intel: Too many years alone have left Ezekiel Grunt a little bit...off. But during interrogation he did report seeing a pudgy man in a Tiki mask, though he thought it was a bad dream.
Profile: We don't know much about who this is or what he's up to. Nice mask, though. His name is pronounced AH-ah-MAH-kooah-LEH-nah-LEH-nah, if that helps. "Tiki Guy" is easier to pronounce.
He's known on several islands around here and he has access to highly advanced technology.
Intel: This won't be the last we see of this guy. The locals fear him, probably because he speaks loudly AND carries a big stick.
There are four more islands that need our help. We will regroup and continue soon!
There are four more islands that need our help. We will regroup and continue soon!
His Excellency the President for Life

By providing us with these permissions, we will help you and your friends connect and provide you the latest news about the game.
Why Does Empires & Allies ask me for information?
Our primary use of your basic information, such as your name and photo, as well as your friends list is to enable you to see and play with your friends in our game.

We use your email address to send you alerts on things like gifts, neighbor invitations and occasionally info on new features, games and special offers, including free virtual cash. You can change your preferences at any time.
We provide fun ways for you to share posts and rewards with friends on Facebook. We don't post without your permission.
We need to know your birthday and game activity to ensure you receive age-appropriate and relevant game content.
You have {amount} Friends that are playing Empires & Allies, why not join the fun?
Check out our Privacy Policy for more information.
We allow your friends to follow your latest Achievements or New High Scores you earn in-game.
We allow you to view your friends\u00e2\u0080\u0099 Achievements and Scores so that you may keep up with them.

The popular festival returns, with a researchable Bismarck and Tiger Tank, plus a Fokker Jet and Beer Hall!
For a limited time, get a free Elite Medivac when you buy all 5 elite Experimental units. Look great in red!
OSA Missile Ship, MLRS, TU-160, Higgins, Ambulance, and Medivac - now Elite!
A second chance at the Yamato, Hood, Bismarck, and Enterprise. Now researchable!
Government Decorations increase the payouts when your friends serve in your government buildings!
WARNING: Missions for the hardcore. Put your butt on the line - it's the ONLY way to earn Black Ops Units.
Play the new and improved Survival Mode and win the Ultimate Survivor Award!
Reach level 5 in Hidden Chronicles and receive 1 Nuclear Bomb, 1 15 Energy, and 1 15 Element Z.
Mafia Wars Shakedown for iOS. Battle Friends, Steal Collections, Rule the World.
Battle friends, steal collections, and rule the world.
Set sail for freebooting pirate adventure in the exciting new Shake Your Booty mini-series!
Gather the troops, and march together with infantry from multiple nations!
Is It Your Birthday? Decorations Have Arrived!
An island without an Ore Refinery and a Disease Control Center is just plain sad. Make your island happy.
You need divers, so build a Scuba Center! They can't dive without a license, so build a License Office, too.
For a limited time, you have been selected to receive an Empire Points discount on parts for your {item}.
Glory to the worker! Get the SU-122 and the Ekranoplan battleship, for a limited time. Now upgradable!
Join the global effort to stop an army of mechanized assault units! Repel to unlock exclusive rewards!
Big power in small packages! the MULE Infantry Robot, Artillery Jeep, and Eagle UAV - now upgradable!
Domo arigato! Try the JASDF Stealth Fighter, the I-400 sub, and the Type 94 Tank. Banzai!
A group of powerful investors has been taken hostage. It's up to the Black Ops team to free them!
Be the very model of a modern Major General with the Warrior, the Ocean, and the Dreadnought!
Ho ho ho! Our holiday is under attack...by the Dark Alliance! Stop them with these tactically merry items.
Real units...Real weird. The Wasp, Kettenkrad, and Horten Bomber. Now researchable!
More Titans? Help destroy them all and retrieve unique Titan parts for reverse engineering in the future!
A thief is among us, and it could be one of our allies! Solve the mystery and unlock an exclusive unit!
Build a Titan Lab and pave the way to world domination!
At long last, you can finally build and fight with your own Titan! Deploy it now!
Build the Air Depot today to store any planes you have on your island.
Build the Naval Depot today to store any ships you have.
Build the Army Depot today to store any ground units you have.
The Air and Naval Depots just got bigger. You can now park up to 80 units in each!
The Eel is racing a team to the North Pole to retrieve a meteorite. You must beat him there!
Lions, Tigers, and Bears: the Return
The Mountain Lion, the King Tiger Tank, and the Bear Bomber - now upgradable!
Do you like your units BIG? Sure you do. Whip these out and impress your friends. Now upgradable, too!
SIX new units, all upgradable! It's a celebration of new battlefield technology!
Brand new, more powerful versions of the Hood, Bismark, Yamato, and Enterprise! Now, upgradable!
New and more powerful versions of the Hood, Bismark, Yamato, and Enterprise! Now in Elite - and upgradable!
There's a civil war in Mercadia. Pick a side and earn units or EP mystery crates containing up to 50 EP!
Power-Ups don't cost a turn, buy some now!
Buy the Chimera, the first fully researched collectable unit. Supply is limited!
Elite versions of the Zumwalt battleship, F-35 fighter, NLOS artillery, and Bastille tank.
Elite versions of the Wasp infantry, Hornet artillery, Type 94 tank, and HMS Ocean carrier.
Catch the 2-hour Series Premiere of ALCATRAZ from Executive Producer J.J. Abrams, MON 1/16 at 8/7c on FOX!
You should improve your units by researching them. If you haven't placed your research buildings, look for them in your inventory!
We\u00e2\u0080\u0099ve discovered a Titan Factory assembling Red Titans! Another invasion is imminent unless it\u00e2\u0080\u0099s destroyed!
The Return of the Real Killer Elite
We've given 5 of our limited edition units an Elite upgrade: more power and a paint job! Now upgradable!
Your game is running in HD mode. If things are too slow, click the eyeball button to improve performance!
Help B.F. Dealio collect several items, and you'll get a Platinum Unit! Do it as many times as you want!
Turkish units? The Altay, the T-129 Mongoose, the Rocket Buggy, the TF-2000, and Turkish Infantry.
Union Infantry, Confederate Infantry, Monitor Battleship, Hunley Sub, and a Civil War Battlefield Deco.
Elite Zumwalt battleship, F-35 fighter, NLOS artillery, and Bastille tank. Now upgradable!
Release the Kraken (after you buy it)! It's a collectible unit, already fully researched! LIMITED SUPPLY!
Now easier! Complete the missions to get an unlock, which is fully researchable.
Doctor Seabolt had plenty of spare parts, and used them to make some awesome units!
Get the Tricolori Fighter, Dardo IFV Tank, Centauro Artillery, Alpini Infantry and Army Quarters!
Elite versions of the Wasp infantry, Hornet artillery, Type 94 tank, and HMS Ocean carrier. Now upgradable!
One of your allies is missing! What happened? You need to find out...fast!
Elite versions of Altay Tank, Mongoose Copter, TF-2000 Frigate, plus the Turkish F-16 and Army Quarters.
Elite versions of the Mosquito Infantry, Kestrel, Coyote Artillery Buggy, Doberman Tank, and Bat Ray!
Build the strongest tier of units from Barracks IV, Shipyard IV, Hangar IV!
The L.E. Unit Factory is now available! Here's your chance to unlock the ability to build limited edition units whenever you want!
Own the Most Powerful Air Unit!
Buy The Harpy, a fully researched collectible unit. Supply is limited!
Union Artillery, Confederate Artillery, the Merrimack Battleship, Artillery Decoration, and Campsite!
Elite versions of the Dragonfly, Behemoth, Tiger Moth, Narwhal, and Griffin!
An evil organization has plans of detonating an Element Z dirty bomb. Prevent this...at all cost!
Challenge players across the globe and unlock new unique elite units!
Get the Cavour 550, the Sea King, the Elite Centauro, the Elite Dardo IFV, and the Alpini Bonus Deco!
The Tatra T-811, the Polikarpov, and elite versions of the Komet, and Army Motorcycle.
Steele is under heavy attack from Titan units, and he thinks that one of your allies may be responsible!
There's a rogue Titan on the loose - a damaged Titan. If it gets into the wrong hands, we're all doomed. Find it!
A separatist group has emerged. Find out their motives.
What's this? It looks like a really small... Titan. It's kind of cute actually. Let's examine it!
The Titans are back. They've hit Dr. G Owari's lab and it looks bad. She has no idea what a Titan is so we've gotta break it to her gently.
Our favorite terrorist organization, Alchemy, is at it again. Their flavor of the month? Counterfeit money.
An influx of refugees has caught the attention of the global community. Our people demand action from us.
A top secret conference hosted by a military facility atop the snow-capped mountains of the north is violently attacked by the Dark Alliance. You're invited.
The Graves Girls are at it again. This time, they're fighting over Steele. Gina has kidnapped Steele and Tina is throwing a pretty large scale hissy fit. Phew, talk about girl trouble.
At the core of your Empire's Intelligence Agency, a small group of elite agents have taken matters into their own hands and we are now on the brink of a cold war.

The Eel, has hacked into Dr. Seabolt's laboratory computer and stolen the plans for a Nuclear Bomb Neutralizer. He's going to sell this to a ruthless dictator who wants to unleash nuclear fury on the world.
An entire fleet of your most important carriers have gone missing off the coast of a foreign empire. They are unreachable and our satellite images show nothing.

An unknown group of highly skilled art thieves has broken into the Stellencolt Museum and stolen a piece of art. But it's not just any piece of art, there's a secret hidden in the piece that must never get out.
Sir, please respond, this is incredibly urgent!
Challenge players across the globe and unlock new unique elite units!
Try World Domination Mode and challenge players across the globe. Unlock new elite units!
An automated submarine missile platform is set to launch an attack!
Viper has some nefarious plans involving the Dark Alliance's funds. He'll cut you in if you help!
Where is Steele? The Eel has kidnapped Steele and is demanding a hefty ransom. To the rescue!
Get the Snow Infantry, Wiesel Tankette, Caio Duilio Battleship, Gripen Fighter, and Eurocopter.
Get the Leviathan Carrier, Peregrine Fighter, Vulture Copter, Bulldog Artillery, and Hyena Tank.
Own the Most Powerful Ground Unit!
Buy the Cerberus, a fully researched collectable unit. Supply is limited!
Own One of the Most Powerful Battleships!
Buy a fully researched, collectable unit of the Crimson Hand Battalion. Supply is limited!
Own the Most Powerful Copter Around!
Buy the Pegasus, a fully researched, collectable unit of the Crimson Hand Battalion. Supply is limited!
Buy the Triton, a fully researched, collectable unit of the Crimson Hand Battalion. Supply is limited!
Own the Most Powerful Infantry Unit!
Buy the Artemis, a fully researched, collectable unit of the Crimson Hand Battalion. Supply is limited!
Buy the Gordon, a fully researched, collectable unit of the Crimson Hand Battalion. Supply is limited!
Expand your empire and capture powerful free units!
Build the Surveillance Tower to reveal hidden units on your island
Brand new units types have are now available to capture from your Mystery Units
Elite versions of the Leviathan, Peregrine Fighter, Vulture Copter, Bulldog Artillery, and Hyena Tank!
Check out the ALL NEW Elite vehicles available in Red Rampage VI!
Act fast! Get the Piranha, Devilfish, Fledermaus, Condor, and Jackrabbit...before they're gone!
Don't miss the ALL NEW Heavy Hardware II items!
Assault your enemies with the Ghillie Suit, Swedish S-Tank, Nuclear Sub Carrier, UAV Bomber and Sharaf 2.
Later this week, Empires & Allies will no longer support Malay. Users in Malaysia can still play in English.
Get the Elite Snow Infantry, Caio Duilio Battleship, Gripen Fighter, Eurocopter and Wiesel MK20 Tankette!
Get Elite versions of the Piranha, Devilfish, Fledermaus, Condor and Jackrabbit. They won't be here long!
The Grasshopper, Barracuda, Dual Fang, Night Falcon and Sea Horse are here. Get 'em while they're hot!
Fall in line, men! Build the Military March for a 15% Government and Military coin discount.
A pugilist's haven. This Army Boxing Gym offers a bonus of 20% on production costs.
The best port in a storm! The Naval Officers' Club offers a 20% Housing and Military bonus.
The Kite Park offers a heavyweight coin bonus of 30% on adjacent houses!
Earn as many Dominance Points as you can in World Domination, and earn elite unique units!
New challenges! New rewards that change often! How long can you last? Only the best make it to Wave 60!
Build the all new Weapon Centers to unlock the Fluxatron and auto-complete all your military contracts!
How long can you stand your ground? New unique rewards are here, along with new rewards for every 5th wave!
Want more powerful Titans? Build the Titan Research Center now to research and upgrade Titan parts.
Get the Toad, Sea Dragon, Sky Whale, Flying Squirrel, Flea aaaand a new Limited Edition Titan unit!
The F3 Howitzer, Jungle Recon, ADATS Artillery, UUAV Drone Gunboat and Elite Polikarpov are waiting for you!
Invade and expand! The Bounty Center will deliver Liberty Bonds for fights won against other players!
Get Elite versions of the Grasshopper, Barracuda, Dual Fang, Night Falcon and Sea Horse now!
Get the Red Rampage 9 units now!
The Bull, Twin Orca, Goshawk, Stonefish and Pterosaur are here. What are you waiting for? Get 'em quick!
Get all new Limited Edition units now!
Elite versions of the Mantis, Badger, Tarantula, Yamato 3 and Sea Hive are here. Get 'em, quick!
New Elite versions of units are here!
Get your hands on Elite versions of the Ghost Bat, Phoenix, Buzzard Autogyro, Gator and Sand Shark.
Hot new Elite units are here. Get them now!
Get elite versions of the Toad, Sea Dragon, Sky Whale, Flying Squirrel and Flea. They won't last long!
New, elite units are now available.
Grab the Wombat, Leatherback, Shrike, Gyrfalcon 01 and Snakehead while they're still available!
Get the Armadillo, Viperfish, Flying Fox, Terrier and Hammerhead. Hurry, they won't be here long!
Get some outrageously cool units now!
The Titan Machine gun is now researchable!
You can now build new Limited Edition units in the Limited Edition Unit Factory. Get crackin'!
Produce all rare metals from a single building. Build the Super Ore Mine and start producing ore today!
Earn 30 Medals in Slingo and receive 1 Tactical Nuke, 1 15 Energy, and 1 15 Element Z
Level up faster! Capture and imprison neighbors to start receiving double the XP on everything
Sir, Seabolt is sending us a message...something about more Energy. Better stand back though. He loves drama!
The Fox Tank, Moray Submarine, Locust Bomber, Gyrfalcon 02 VTOL and Scorpion Artillery are here!
Get these all new LE units while they last.
Collect and redeem Merit Tokens for cool rewards!
Have I Got a Deal For You..
My name is Mr.Sterling, visit my yacht for an offer you would be a fool to refuse!
Elite versions of the Bull, Orca, Goshawk, Stonefish and Pterosaur are now available. Go get 'em!
Go on a rampage - a Red Rampage. New Elite units are out!
Get Elite versions of the Armadillo, Viperfish, Flying Fox, Terrier and Hammerhead. To the battlefield, Commander!
Stake your claim to Elite versions of the Wombat, Leatherback, Shrike, Gyrfalcon and Snakehead!
New, Elite units are now available.
All new, Elite versions of the Fox, Moray, Locust, Gyrfalcon 02 and Scorpion are now available. Grab them while they're hot!
The rampage continues - new Red Rampage units are here!
They're here! For a limited time only, get the Barosaurus, Iguanodon, Cronus, Ophion and Tigerfly.
Buy and deploy these dangerous units.
Commander, word across the Empires is that 15 Energy, 15 Element Z, and a Tactical Nuke could be yours if you reach level 15 on Bubble Safari!
Play Bubble Safari to win Energy, Element Z and a Nuke!
Are your Titans playing with dust bunnies in your Empire? Build this Collider to produce Element Z as easily as any other resource!
From Russia with love, the Grand Citadel is just what you need for a 12% acceleration on military production. Stake your claim now!
When you can't expand outwards, go upwards. Put Houses together in a high-rise Neighborhood to take care of some of your real estate issues!
The Cheetah, Basilosaurus, Cooper's Hawk, Heron and Broman are here. Get them while they're hot!
The all-new Karmen, Rizla, Razor, Goalkeeper and Ronan are here. Get them while they're hot!
Sniff out those agents of terror! Build the Intelligence Bureau for a 12% military discount and twice the payout on repelled invasions across your Empire.
Who's up for an international exchange? Build the Turkmen Assembly for a 20% industrial and housing bonus.
Now you can unlock the Barracks IV, Hangar IV and Shipyard IV at lower levels!
Earn War Chests in World Domination! Each War Chest contains building parts, resources or Power-Ups. What will you win?
Upgrade your Parliament to the World Parliament and add neighbors without being Facebook friends. Coming soon!
A piece of France's military might in your Empire! Build La Station Militaire for a 15% industrial bonus and military production acceleration.
Active Allies aren't so hard to come by. Upgrade your Parliament to the World Parliament and add Allies without being Facebook friends!
Get yourself the Coper, Razor, Tanay, Roosevelt V3 and Washington T4. Hurry, they'll be gone soon!
Deploy more dangerous units - the Dangerous Deployment 4 set is here.
Brand new units are here! Get the Lincoln T-100, Jefferson T-300, Quarterback Patrol, Pierce C3 and Bruce B-Square Bomber now!
Itching for battle? Get some dangerous new units first!
The Shan T20, Madison T3, Red Flag Infantry, Franklin B2 and Red Flag Tank are here along with a brand new Titan part!
Get all new, dangerous units and a brand new Titan part too!
Get Elite and new, Super versions of the Barosaurus, Iguanodon, Cronus, Ophion and Tigerfly. Super units give out double the XP so grab them now!
Get ready for new Super units that give out double XP and new Elite units as well.
Super versions of the Cheetah, Basilosaurus, Razor Hawk, Heron and Broman are here to give you double the XP in combat!
Super units give you twice the XP! New ones are here.
Unit strength isn't all that matters in combat - higher Tiers actually do more damage! Look for Unit Tier in the yellow star.
The Most Powerful Gunboat is Here!
Buy the Beacon, a fully researched, collectable unit of the Crimson Hand Battalion. As always, supply is limited!
I'm Scarlett, your chief advisor. The enemy did a lot of damage. We have to fight back.
Hello, Commander. General Scarlett reporting for duty. We need to attack these enemy troops!
Nice shooting, Commander! Let's hit 'em again!
More enemy forces have landed on the north shore! Return to battle!
Your troops are ready to fight the Dark Alliance. Click the enemy portrait to attack!
Select the Cannon Artillery to send into battle.
You're all set, Commander! Click on the "Fight" button.
Cannon Artillery are stronger against the Vintage Tank. Click to select it.
Let's start by building a new Barracks.
Place the Barracks foundation on the ground.
Now click on it three times to finish building.
The enemy never sleeps, so let's keep rebuilding. Look for new Tasks on the left.
You can't win this fight on your own. Use a power up!
Before going into battle, you should pick allies to help you.
Select your ally to get some help.
Now let's place a new flag.
Place the flag on the ground.
Mouse over the Enemy Portrait then select Attack to start the battle.
More enemy forces have landed on the coast! Mouse over the Enemy Portrait then select Attack to start the battle.
General Scarlett reporting for duty. Commmander, we're under attack again!
Cannon Artillery are stronger against the Vintage Tank. Click to select it.
Your troops are ready to fight the Dark Alliance. Click the enemy portrait to attack!
Select the Cannon Artillery to send into battle.
Select the Cadet Soldiers to send into battle.
You're all set, Commander! Click on the "Fight" button.
Cannon Artillery are stronger against the Vintage Tank. Click to select it.
Direct hit! Match up these class symbols during combat for greater success!
We need reinforcements. Let's start with a new Barracks.
General Scarlett reporting for duty. Let's start by building a new Barracks.
Our beautiful island! Destroyed! Commander, you must lead us back to glory! Let's start with a new Barracks.
Place the Barracks foundation on the ground.
Now click on it three times to finish building.
Click on the Enemy Portrait and select Fight Now! to engage Captain Krunsch.
Commander, remember to use the class symbols as a guide when choosing units.
The enemy never sleeps, so let's keep rebuilding. Look for new Tasks on the left.
Now let's train some Cadets to protect the island. Click on the Barracks and select Cadet Soldiers.
Click on Return Home when you're ready to leave Steele's island.
Stand out from the crowd ... Expand your empire!
Construct Civic Buildings to grow your population!
Enjoy Full Screen mode, in all its glory!
Fight with Friends - if you dare!

Congratulations! Your purchase will soon be added to your inventory.

Buy Empire Points, get some to send to friends!
Congrats! You have won a special limited-time offer! Purchase a package for yourself and receive free Empire Points to share with friends. Surprise your friends with the perfect gift!
After purchasing, select friends and the number of Empires Points to send to each
Click 'Send' and friends will receive a Gift Card via Facebook!
An Offer You Can't Refuse...Pay one price to use as much energy as you want for a period of time. Keep going and going and going!
Unlimited Energy has already been purchased. You have {timeString} left before it expires!

Citizens report seeing the Lucky Mermaid cruise ship approaching our port. People say it brings Empire Points wherever it anchors. As your Advisor, I suggest we do whatever it takes to keep the Lucky Mermaid docked at our empire.
Legend says The Lucky Mermaid brings Empire Points wherever it docks!
Legend says The Lucky Mermaid brings Empire Points wherever it docks!
Citizens report seeing the Lucky Mermaid cruise ship approaching our port. People say it brings Empire Points wherever it anchors. Let's go find out!
Everyday, staff the Golden Casino to collect rewards! You may collect rewards every 24 hours..
Gather equipment and allies to spy on the Lucky Mermaid. Trust me, our empire's piece of the action will pay off big time!
Glad we kept an eye on the Lucky Mermaid. The legend is true! Let's keep her docked at our empire.
Let's throw a party on the Lido Deck to welcome the Lucky Mermaid to our empire. We can negotiate a share of the profits.
Ugh. That party left me with such a headache. But I think it was worth it to ease our guests into negotiations.
Harvest {total} Watermelons for a delicious fruit salad
A show of force will convince the operators of the Lucky Mermaid to give our Empire a cut. These are our waters and our people deserve a share of the profits.
Don't even try to rock MY boat. Seriously.
Build {total} Submarine Gunboats to form a blockade
Negotiations are going well! They agreed to build us our own ship, The Golden Mermaid. We need to provide parts and financing.
Wow. That was not easy. All this hard work will pay off once we get the Golden Mermaid!
3 of 5: Brunch with the Bad Guys
Uh-oh, the cruise ship operators have hired some seafaring Dark Alliance goons to muscle us out. Let's go knock some skulls together!
The Dark Alliance? Again? Are those clowns ever going to retire?
3 of 5: Locking out the Low Lifes
We've defeated the Dark Alliance creeps, but there could be more of those wharf rats lurking nearby. Let's bulk up our defenses to protect the Lucky Mermaid!
Hey! You beat Beau Le Chomp! Seems like I should at least get a new alligator handbag out of the deal...
I know those creeps won't let us have the Lucky Mermaid that easily. Let's beef up our forces before they show up for Round Two.
Good job rallying the troops. When it comes to firepower, I say the more the merrier.
4 of 5: High Stakes on the High Seas
To start the construction of the Golden Mermaid, we need more materials and supplies. Let's roll up our sleeves!
Money...oil...torpedoes...I know there's a joke in here someplace. Let me get back to you.
Uh-oh... That ship has caught the eye of a neighboring empire to the South. They're sending squads of elite troops to capture it. Time to protect our guests!
You come after my cruise ship...you leave with a split lip.
Attack an Opponent in Battle Blitz
Win the battle against the Butchers
Win the battle against B-52 Bombers
The Lucky Mermaid will set sail soon. Let's build the Golden Mermaid pronto! We'll progress faster with the help of new friends.
Shakespeare said, "all that glitters is not gold". Shakespeare was kind of stupid, right?
Never mind the Lucky Mermaid, her sister ship The Golden Mermaid is on its way. Stomp these punks and we'll hit the jackpot!
Can a ship built entirely of gold really float? Wait, don't answer that. I really don't want to know.
Battle Malady Burns and Fleet of Ekranoplans
Battle Jada Bombs and Squadron of Vampire Jets
Battle Baron Crashalot, Kai Tana, Professor Von Helman, and The Eel
You earned the Element Z Refinery!
You earned Empire Points and 2 units!
An arms dealer wants to make a deal for an Element Z Refinery, Empire Points, or BOTH!
A briefcase full of Empire Points
a briefcase full of Empire Points

some briefcase full of Empire Pointss
the briefcase full of Empire Pointss
the briefcase full of Empire Points

string.original: An arms dealer has been working on an Element Z Refinery. He's willing to sell it, or give us Empire Points. Or both!
Everyday, staff the Z Refinery, and collect random amounts of Element Z! You may collect Element Z every 24 hours.
A fleet of Yamato II battleships
I'm going to release one mission to you per day. Complete all six missions, and I'll send you a Yamato II battleship. Complete the missions multiple times, and you can have a fleet of Yamato IIs!
Once they become available, you can complete the missions in any order. Best of all, missions are repeatable and there is no limit on the rewards you can earn!
Let's Make the Deal: EP or Z

Research funding is scarce, but a somewhat shady arms dealer offered to help. He has the technology to build an Element Z Refinery, or he can give us Empire Points - for science! He wants a couple of "favors" in return, though.
The arms dealer will help us out, if we do "a few chores" for him.
I'm reluctant to deal with an arms dealer, but desperate times... He wants a "small payment" as a good faith gesture.
You can buy resources from your neighbors' markets to speed up your acquisition.
I don't know why he couldn't just buy the wood and ore himself. But he appears to be ready to deal.
An Element Z Refinery is essential for my research. The arms dealer wants us to build him units, which he can trade. I'm okay with that.
You can buy resources from your neighbors' markets to speed up your acquisitions.
I have a bad feeling about this.
The Road to Free Empire Points
Everyone needs metal, and this arms dealer says he can't get enough. If we do, he promises Empire Points AND free units.
Collect ore from allies, or trade for it on the market.
Element Z Refineries don't build themselves. We need a few parts to make this happen. And a squadron of planes must be dealt with, too.
Ask your friends to send you parts, or get some parts from the second quest chain!
That wasn't so bad. Once we have our Z Refinery operational, we'll be cooking with gas, as the kids say.
Our arms dealer wants a plethora of metals. Seems reasonable. Nobody gets hurt fulfilling this request.
Collect ore from allies, or trade for it on the market.
I could never solve the core containment issues with my own design. This Z Refinery better work!
Okay. I won't lie. This is tough. The arms dealer wants to drum up business. Beat 25 foes. Plus, collect taxes and get some oil for him.
Impressive, Commander. Really. That was a lot to ask, but... Empire Points do not grow on trees.
Why an arms dealer needs several tons of fruit is beyond me. But he also wants us to take out a competitor's squad. You can do that, right?
Click the Fight button to attack the ground forces for the arms dealer.
I didn't expect to find harvesting fruit to be so...soothing. The fighting, not so much. I'm a thinker, not a brawler.
Why are parts necessary to get Empire Points? The arms dealer says he needs them to "grease palms." Yuck. Also... lend your allies a helping hand.
Ask your allies. Help each other help yourselves.
Good job. Once we get the Empire Points, we can use them for any number of my experiments! Oh...I mean...whatever you want, Commander.
We were a bit too aggressive, so ask our allies to give us the thumbs-up to make sure "we're cool." Then, help some friends and blow something up.
Ask friends for the thumbs-up to make sure everyone is happy, then use the Blackbird in combat after collecting coins from allies.
This arms dealer sure does ask for a lot. But...nothing is gained without venture, and you're the one doing all the work anyway, so no problem.
Have {total} Friends Give You the Thumbs-Up
Okay. We have the arms dealer's word that this is it. We "take out" three squads, and the Element Z Refinery is ours!
These aren't the strongest units, but don't underestimate them.
I did it! I mean...you helped, of course. The Element Z Refinery is ours! He was a man of his word. He threw in other items, too! No Empire Points, though.
The only thing between us and Empire Points are these three heavily armed squadrons. I'll wait at HQ while you "take them out," or whatever you call it.
These fights won't be easy, but no one said they would be.
Well done, Commander! The arms dealer delivered. He threw in some impressive units, too! Too bad it didn't come with the Element Z Refinery.

Ahoy, matey! I got a proposition for ya. A ship went down 'round here, and I'll split the haul with ya. The more work you do, the bigger yer share. With my brains and yer sweat, together we'll have...sweaty brains. And TREASURE!
Click to help Krunsch salvage a sunken ship, and partake in the booty!
Help me salvage a sunken ship, and partake in the booty!
Get Captain Krunsch's ship into working order.
Captain Krunsch can get you to a sunken ship with treasure. But first we must pull up his sunken ship, the Butcher, to get us there.
Watching Krunsch look at his ship, just for a second, I thought I saw a tear in his eye.
Collect {total} Sea Cranes to pull Krunsch's boat up from the deep
Gather {total} Oil to power the boat
Get {total} Barnacle Scrapers to clean up the Butcher
Prepare to sail to the wreck.
Make final preparations to head out to the secret location of the wreck.
We've arrived at the location of the wreck. Time to start diving!
Get {total} Dive Permits from friends so you can navigate the deep
Harvest {total} Red Onions - they won't spoil at sea
Krunsch is offering a bigger cut of the profits if we help clean up his ship.
We've surveyed the wreck and it seems as though something is definitely down there.
Collect {total} Air Compressors to fill dive tanks
Do Krunsch's dirty work: settle his feud with Kung Fucius
Earn {total} Red Hearts to add some love to the ship
Keep Krunsch safe and he'll give you a reward.
Keep the area safe while Krunsch dives down to the wreck, and he'll give you a reward.
Krunsch found a lot of treasure, but he's only offering a small cut. Help out more, and earn a bigger reward.
Collect {total} Giant Squid Repellent to keep Krunsch safe below
Defeat the Graves Girls, who want the wreck for themselves
Fend off Kai Tana's forces while Krunsch snatches the loot
Keep providing Krunsch with the supplies he needs to dive down to the sunken ship.
Like the monkey with his tail on the railroad track, Krunsch says it won't be long now.
Recruit {total} Friends to be your Cabin Boy
Those Red Onions are getting tart - harvest {total} Pineapples
Speed Up Neighbors' Farms {total} times to get more food
An honest day's working for a criminal for an honest day's pay.
Krunsch appreciates your help. Now prove that you're worthy of being part of his best crew.
Krunsch appreciates your help - your cut of the treasure has been awarded!
Get {total} Swim Fins from friends for Krunsch's crew
Prove your fighting skills by completing {total} waves of Survival Mode
Produce {total} Wood to re-do the ship's deck
Krunsch just needs a little more help.
Krunsch is ready to raise the mother lode, but it's going to be more work than we thought.
For coming this far, Krunsch is going to reward you with a large mystery crate!
Battle The Eel to kill time while Krunsch is down below
Add {total} new allies to help pull up the treasure
Catch Brown Turkeys, so Mac can pardon them and get re-elected. Use the turkeys to earn Mystery Crates that contain exclusive rewards, like the Platinum Raven - the most powerful unit in the game!
Three levels of difficulty: the harder levels give you a chance at better rewards in your Mystery Crate.
Complete to win ONE of these amazing prizes!
You earned a Bronze Mystery Crate! Try your luck again, or go for a harder challenge - and better prize pool!
You earned a Silver Mystery Crate! Try your luck again, or go for a harder challenge - and better prize pool!
You earned a Gold Mystery Crate! Try your luck again for a chance at a different reward!
You have {num} Brown Turkeys. You need {total}. Go find some more!
Help Mac out by sending him turkeys for a chance to earn Platinum Villain Units - the strongest in the game!
I need your help: I'm going to pardon as many turkeys as I can. Help me out, and I'll send you a Mystery Crate with exclusive rewards!
I can get re-elected if I pardon enough Brown Turkeys - voters are suckers for compassion. Complete all three tasks and you'll get a Bronze Mystery Crate with one of nine rewards.
The best way to collect Brown Turkeys is by fighting. You can also get them by tending to your empire or helping neighbors.
Have neighbors send {total} Bashful Turkeys for Mac
Gather{total} Brown Turkeys and send to Mac
Thanks for your help, but I'll need to pardon more turkeys if I'm going to win this election.
Pardoning more Brown Turkeys will raise my poll numbers. Finish all three tasks, and get a Silver Mystery Crate with one of nine rewards!
The best way to collect Brown Turkeys is by fighting. You can also get them by tending to your empire or helping neighbors.
Have neighbors send {total} Speedy Turkeys for Mac
Gather {total} Brown Turkeys and send to Mac
Boy, that's a lot of turkeys! But I can do better if I pardon more. Pardoning turkeys is a lot better than kissing babies. They don't smell as bad.
With my turkey-pardoning strategy in place, I'm guaranteed re-election. Finish all three tasks, and get a Gold Mystery Crate with one of nine rewards!
The best way to collect Brown Turkeys is by fighting. You can also get them by tending to your empire or helping neighbors.
Have neighbors send {total} Stuffed Turkeys for Mac
Gather{total} Brown Turkeys and send to Mac
I have locked-in the turkey-lover demographic. Here's a gold mystery crate for helping me out!
Join the search to find Empire Points and an Elite unit!
We've heard reports of a brand new Elite unit. Complete a series of missions to reveal the unit, and you'll get to keep it, along with a special reward!
Mercenaries will help you collect the parts for a new Elite unit. Complete all the missions and you can keep the unit - and 5 Empire Points!
You must complete the missions in order, unless you purchase early access. You can repeat and earn rewards up to ten times!
Lobster Bay needs assistance. The mission is to search, rescue, and defend. DANGER: this one won't be easy. It's only for the best of the best. It'll take a lot of guts to get through this one.
Try your best, but no one said it would be easy. Success is the only way to get the Black Ops Units.
You earned a Black Ops Fighter! Well done!
Click to start a Black Ops mission - if you dare! It's the only way to earn exclusive Black Ops Units.
Black Ops missions ain't for the faint of heart. They're brutal, but they're also the only way to earn exclusive Black Ops units.
Click to start a Black Ops mission - if you dare! It's the only way to earn exclusive Black Ops Units.
Recent volcanic activity has displaced a large number of people from Lobster Bay. We've got to get them out of there.
Ask your friends for help with the refugees.
Get {total} friends to drop supplies for refugees
Collect {total} Wood to build temporary shelters
Collect {total} Water Jugs for the refugees
The people have enough to survive, but the eruption has done a lot of damage. Eruptions will do that to you.
We need to get ahead of these fires and get them put out before they do any more damage.
Fires are running rampant on the island.
Get {total} friends to send aircraft to put out fires
Cut down {total} trees on neighbor islands to set fire breaks
Defeat enemy units hampering our fire fighters
The fires are under control, but our work here has only just started.
We're going to have to go back in and search for survivors. Start gathering volunteers.
Get friends to send {total} Rescue Dogs to search for survivors
Place {total} Aircraft to help in the search
Collect {total} Oil to fuel the search aircraft
We've assembled the search parties. Get them on the ground where they're needed.
Start the search for lost refugees. Make sure we have permission from the surrounding areas.
We need to fly into Lobster Bay to search for survivors.
Get {total} neighbors to allow airspace access
Win {total} Battle Blitz fights to cut off reinforcements
Harvest {total} Wheat to help feed the rescued survivors
We've done what we can to find any remaining survivors. I just hope we've done enough.
Damage to the existing communication infrastructure is worse than we thought, and looters are on their way.
Survive {total} waves in Survival Mode to train forces
Place {total} Gunboats to fight off looters
Our forces are ready. Let's show those opportunists what we're made of!
Lobster Bay looters are inbound. Take them out before they do any more damage.
Get {total} neighbors to send Satellite Weather Maps
Lobster Bay is now safe enough to begin the long process of rebuilding.
Click the beacon to repel the Titan invasion, and eventually gain their technology, light-years ahead of our own!
My army of 1,000,000 mechanized Titans will cause a seismic event, sinking all of the island empires in this region in 14 days. Your doom approaches!
Our allies are under simultaneous attacks from the mechanized Titans. We must join a global effort to stop them before they flood the Earth!
Damage done to Titans will persist between fights! Defeat them to earn unique parts for reverse engineering Titan technology!
These units will help you defeat more titans.
You have {num} Ore. You need {total}. Go collect more!
Launch this Acid Blast to weaken the Titan.
All the Titans have been stopped - for now. You personally defeated {num} Titans, and the entire world thanks you!
The army of 1,000,000 Titans was vanquished, no thanks to you. Too busy, were you? Fortunately, your allies stepped up!
Use everything you can: Power-Ups, Upgrades, and Experimental Units. It will take every trick in the book to bring down a Titan.
There are {num} Titans left. Defeat more and repel the invasion!
We need to study images and analyses from our allies to learn about how to take down one of these Titans.
Dr. Seabolt will use the Recon Images to determine if these things have a weakness.
Gather {total} Recon Images of a Titan from allies
Ask for {total} Scientific Reports of a Titan from allies
Titan defeated! The power readings were off the chart. We were lucky to survive against that technology.
Our defenses are too soft if more Titans arrive. We better improve our communication and defense systems, NOW!
The Missile Attack Power-Up can be built in the Power-Up Factory.
Build {total} planes to patrol the perimeter
Reports are coming in that there are more powerful Titans: bigger, stronger and meaner.
We can't defeat 1,000,000 of these things ourselves. Allies around the world will have to help, or our island is sunk.
Ask your friends to send you Air Raid Sirens.
Gather {total} Sweet Potatoes for emergency supplies
We're safe for now. The people in the bomb shelters will now have sweet potatoes to keep them happy.
Seabolt has a plan for a special Power-Up that could hurt the Titans. Make sure he gets the parts he needs!
Look for green backgrounds in the Decorations tab of the Build menu to find Military Decorations.
Get {total} Magnesium Inverter Coils from Allies
Speed up Neighbor military structures {total} times
If a million of these Titans aren't destroyed, our planet is toast. We've got to do our part, at least.
Each new Titan has improved weapons and hull strength. Seabolt's got to find a solution...or we're done for.
If your friends don't sign up, Dr. Seabolt might be able to send a Titan their way.
Request {total} Large Radiation Panels for bunker
Add {total} Allies to help in the fight
Defeat the Titan before it destroys our command center
That was too close. Each attack, they're sending a stronger Titan. We can't hold them off forever.
We need to evacuate citizens from the coast! Seismic activity from the Titans has caused a tidal wave!
To get through the rough waters, special anchors are needed to hold the rescue boats in place.
Build {total} Carriers to protect the boats
Melt {total} {rare} to build special re-inforced anchors
The evacuation was successful and now we can focus on a counter-attack against the Titans.
To make an effective counter-weapon against the Titans, we'll need a few things. We should also help our allies.
The Propeller Shop can be found in the Decorations tab of the Build menu.
Get {total} Modulators from Allies to build a counter-measure
Staff propeller shop with {total} crew to increase production
We're as ready as we'll ever be. Now all that's left to do is have dinner.
Seabolt has urgent news! He's created an Acid Blast Power-Up to take down the machine!
Find a way to transport the Acid Blast power-ups to the front lines!
Collect Supply Crates to aid our perimeter guards
Collect Inert Containers to transport Acid Blast Power-Ups
Defeat the armored Titan and save your empire
We did it! But there are still more Titans out there. Let's see how many we can destroy!

Me crew and yours truly have arrived for a bit of robbery and relaxation. An adventurous young scallywag like yourself could try to beat us...or you could play it smart and join us for a bit a high seas hijinks. What will it be, matey? Ready to get your timbers shivered?
You've received the infamous Scaly Wench Pirate Ship!
Fight off the pirates, or join them for an EP treasure hunt!
Commander! The infamous Scaly Wench pirate ship has sailed into our waters. Shall we INVESTIGATE or ATTACK?
Ready to get your timbers shivered?
Click on the icons above to find adventure and rewards.
Fight off the pirates, or join them for an EP treasure hunt!
Keep an Eye on the Pirates
Commander! These pirates are a real threat to our island. We must keep an eye on them while we build up our forces!
Watch Towers can be found under the Decorations tab of the Build Menu.
Collect {total} High Power Spotlights to search for the pirates
Gather {total} Binoculars to see what the pirates are doing
Build {total} Watch Towers to keep an eye on the pirates
Honestly, you'd SMELL those pirates coming even if you didn't keep such a close eye on them.
Greetings Lieutenant Landlubber! Lovely waters you have here. Mind if the lads and I anchor for a bit?
The Defense Tower can also protect you from global attacks.
Collect {total} Flare Guns to warn your allies about the pirates
Visit allies to collect {total} coins to prepare for the battle
Good thing you've built up your Navy. Those barnacled bozos are definitely up to no good.
No need to spy on us. We're just here for wine, women and song, in no particular order.
Ask your friends to send you the items you need.
Get {total} Bottles of Wine from allies
Find {total} Little Black Cocktail Dresses for Scarlett and her girlfriends
Build {total} decorations for the pirates' party venue
Wow, those pirates party like...well like pirates, I guess.
We know you're spying on us! Cough up a ransom or we attack! Come on! Cough like you mean it!
Defeat opponents in Battle Blitz to collect Prize Tokens.
Collect {total} Black Pearls to pay the ransom
Collect {total} Prize Tokens to pay the ransom
Collect {total} {rare} from your ore mines to pay the ransom
Keeping these shnooks paid off is pricey. Let's just hope the investment pays off.
Want to join us? Well if you want to be a real scourge of the seven seas, you'll need to prove yourself!
Select your neighbor's portrait then Invade to attack.
Invade {total} neighbors. Show them what you've got!
Looks like you're ready for a new career as a pirate! Do you think they offer dental coverage?
You're a pirate at heart, I can tell. Here's a little parting gift - some pieces of eight and a shred of a lost treasure map. Maybe a smart buccaneer like you can find the rest of it?
Assemble the pieces to zero in on the treasure.
Find the {total} missing pieces of the treasure map
Recruit {total} new allies to join your clan
Arr...all this work is almost worth it to see Scarlett in something other than her uniform for once.
Ahoy you scurvy little sea cucumber! Captain Miguel Malismo and his crew are here to plunder your riches!
Build Power-Ups in the Power-Up Factory.
Build {total} Gunboats to attack the pirate ship from below
Build {total} Aircraft Carriers to attack the pirate ship from above
Nice military build-up Commander. I think we'll need it.
Arr...gearing up for the old, "Upstairs-Downstairs" strategy, eh? You can't fool me, you stupid cabin boy.
The Control Tower 2 can be found under the Decorations tab of the Build menu.
Collect {total} Sand Bags to build a machine gun nest
Build {total} Control Tower 2's to direct air traffic
Add {total} new allies to strengthen your military presence
The best offense is a good defense...or is it the other way around?
Let's build up our military food stores so we can hunker down and hold the line against those crooks!
Have your friends speed up your crops to harvest them sooner.
Harvest {total} Sweet Potatoes for army C Rations
Speed up {total} of your allies' crops for navy Meals Ready to Eat
Harvest {total} of your allies' crops for your military food stores
Good job! An army travels on its stomach, right?
We've got a real war effort going against these pirates! But some Element Z will really help our cause.
Build Experimental Naval Units in the Experimental Shipyard.
Build {total} Experimental Naval units for battle
Defend your island and take out the pirates
Element Z - changing the tide of battle for more than 30 days.
Enough of this silly posturing! Quit dancing and fire your cannons you cowardly guppy!
Ask your friends to send you Zipp Energy Drinks.
Sink the Scaly Wench pirate ship to the bottom of the sea
Those pirates are sunk - literally! What sort of organization names its ship The Scaly Wench anyway?
The private investors funding our Black Ops team have been kidnapped. We can't let them down, or we'll be shut down.
Complete all the missions and you will receive a Black Ops Zumwalt. Players level 49 and above can build the unit in the Shipyard III.
You have {num} Coins. You need {total}. Go collect more!
Click on the Black Ops unit to investigate and unlock the Black Ops Zumwalt.
Click on the Black Ops unit to investigate and unlock the Black Ops Zummwalt.
I've worked with the best of the best, and led them into Hell and back again. Come with me, and you'll unlock the exclusive Black Ops Zumwalt.
That scum, Captain Krunsch has intel on the location of the hostages. We'll need to work with him on this...
Upgrade your forces to have a better shot at winning battles.
Help Krunsch fight pirates who stole some of his booty.
Collect Ships in a Bottle for Captain Krunsch.
Collect Crab Brulee Desserts for Captain Krunsch.
Great work! Keep it up and those investors will be home sipping lattes in no time!
Nothing worthwhile is easy. Follow Krunsch's clues to locate the island where the landowners are being held.
Build Power-Ups in the Power-Up Factory.
Locate Shredded Map Pieces to find the secret island.
Place {total} Gunboats to follow Krunsch's henchmen.
Build {total} Field Repair III Power-Ups to prepare for future battles.
Don't break your arm patting yourself on the back. Our wealthy friends aren't home yet!
Good job locating the island, but getting ashore is something else entirely. You speak crazy native?
Have friends speed up your crops to harvest them sooner.
Harvest {total} Sunflowers for a peace offering.
Collect Electronic Translators to help us communicate.
Battle the natives to show your strength.
Excellent job! But that's only one layer of the onion. Keep peeling!
One of the guards on the island compound can be bribed. Find out which one and give him what he wants!
Spent resources are gone permanently. Make sure you have enough to get by once they're spent.
Collect from Neighbor houses {total} times to find the guard.
Bring {total} Candy Bars to the guards. They love them.
Send {total} Coins to bribe the guards.
It didn't work! They rejected our bribe and exposed us to the leader of the island: Kai Tana!
Kai Tana has seduced our investors and turned them into her loyal zealots! This is outrageous - take her down!
Click on a neighbor profile and select invade.
Get {total} Blindfolds to make sure nobody else gets seduced.
Fight Kai Tana in final battle.
Nice job! Now let's find those families and get them back home!
The landowners are disoriented now that Kai Tana is gone. They need to be returned home for rest and therapy.
Any type of expansion can be used to show appreciation.
Collect {total} Self-Help Audiotapes to assist the landowners' recovery.
Get {total} new expansions to show our appreciation.
Collect {total} Medical Beds for safe transport of the landowners.
You did it! Our backers will need some time to recover. In the meantime, here's a new Black Ops unit.
Our blueprints for a new Gunboat have gone missing, and Intel shows that {playerA,name} might have stolen them!
string.variation: Our blueprints for a new Gunboat have gone missing, and Intel shows that {playerA,fem} might have stolen them!
Our blueprints for a new Gunboat have gone missing, and Intel shows that {playerA,masc} might have stolen them!

string.original: Find who stole the blueprints and you'll be rewarded with 5 EP and an Elite unit! Replay up to 10 times to earn the EP again.
You have {num} {rare}. You need {total}. Go collect more!
You have {num} Wood. You need {total}. Go collect more!
You have {num} Coins. You need {total}. Go collect more!
Which one of your allies stole the Elite Gunboat blueprints? Find out to earn EP and an Elite unit!
Our blueprints for an Elite Gunboat have gone missing, and Intel shows that {playerA,name} might have stolen them!
string.variation: Our blueprints for an Elite Gunboat have gone missing, and Intel shows that {playerA,fem} might have stolen them!
Our blueprints for an Elite Gunboat have gone missing, and Intel shows that {playerA,masc} might have stolen them!

string.original: The blueprints went missing when {playerA,name} recently visited our island. Let's investigate.
string.variation: The blueprints went missing when {playerA,fem} recently visited our island. Let's investigate.
The blueprints went missing when {playerA,masc} recently visited our island. Let's investigate.

string.original: Be nice and help out your neighbors while you're there.
Visit Neighbors {total} times to gather rumors.
Collect {total} Tracking Devices to monitor the suspect's moves.
Gather {total} Satellite Spy Photos of the suspect's island.
Good job, but we still don't have a case. We're going to have to bring {playerA,name} in for questioning.
string.variation: Good job, but we still don't have a case. We're going to have to bring {playerA,fem} in for questioning.
Good job, but we still don't have a case. We're going to have to bring {playerA,masc} in for questioning.

string.original: We need to apprehend our suspect. {playerA,name} is a slippery one, so be careful.
string.variation: We need to apprehend our suspect. {playerA,fem} is a slippery one, so be careful.
We need to apprehend our suspect. {playerA,masc} is a slippery one, so be careful.

string.original: Any kind of Gunboat will do, but weak units won't help you in the long run.
Build {total} Gunboats to transport raiding party.
Gather {total} Disguises to sneak into their Parliament Building.
Good work. We have {playerA,name} in custody. We should get some answers now.
string.variation: Good work. We have {playerA,fem} in custody. We should get some answers now.
Good work. We have {playerA,masc} in custody. We should get some answers now.

string.original: We have {playerA,name} in custody. It's time to get some answers.
string.variation: We have {playerA,fem} in custody. It's time to get some answers.
We have {playerA,masc} in custody. It's time to get some answers.

string.original: You think waterboarding is bad? You've never been pepper-boarded.
Harvest {total} Chili Peppers to get {playerA,name} talking.
string.variation: Harvest {total} Chili Peppers to get {playerA,fem} talking.
Harvest {total} Chili Peppers to get {playerA,masc} talking.

string.original: {playerA,name} doesn't have the blueprints, but somebody is trying to sell them on the black market.
string.variation: {playerA,fem} doesn't have the blueprints, but somebody is trying to sell them on the black market.
{playerA,masc} doesn't have the blueprints, but somebody is trying to sell them on the black market.

string.original: {playerA,name} revealed that the blueprints were being sold at the market. Let's follow this lead.
string.variation: {playerA,fem} revealed that the blueprints were being sold at the market. Let's follow this lead.
{playerA,masc} revealed that the blueprints were being sold at the market. Let's follow this lead.
